comments: Another game where developers are playing, to milk real players. This is SCAM! After 7 days, first player 4 times bigger than the second, 130x bigger than me. I would need like +2 years to match his power. I WANT MY MONEY BACK!!!

Way too difficult. One mistake and you could loose weeks worth of stuff. Stronger players can easily keep you from growing and advancing in the game. It's taking me 4 times as long to grow as my friends. You have too spend a lot of real money to be able to keep up with the competition. I have played for 114 days and have made no progress hardly. With 350k dead troops

This game could get 5 stars if there was a limit on who can attack based on size/strength - as it stands, you are constantly attacked by players 20, 50 or even 100+ times your size, which totally negates lots of time and effort taken to advance in the game.  There is no way to retaliate, even if you play as a group.  This seems to be a common complaint, yet the developer does nothing about it.

Please be advised that this game will not let you change your location after level 5 unless you pay cash, then you can't move to any world that is less than 80 days old. And they won't refund your cash. It's a shame they hustle you like this because it is a cute game. But you get robbed and can t play with friends already in it

comments: It's nice game - very nice graphic, very smooth moving - it would be 5 stars. BUT - I payed for levels 13 and 14 , and the game does not allow me to play in random order - it's not possible to play no. 23 without finishing all numbers before. If you are stuck in some number, you cannot go to another one - you MUST BUY hint!!! It means - you PAID for the game, but you MUST PAY again for hint - or you are blocked in PAID  game. It's just not fair.

A lot of Numberlink programs have "fake" puzzles - they have multiple solutions unless additional non-standard "rules" are followed... which are NEVER fun. This app doesn't do that. These are the real deal, and are VERY satisfying to solve. The price is extremely low for the quantity and quality on offer; I highly recommend this game.

I have now completed a 365 day streak... During this past year of playing this game daily, I've had an idea. What if once you hit a certain amount of streak days you unlock a new something? Like a new pack or flow color? That would be nice so that you are working towards something. :)

I loved flow free from a young age. I've played until 9√ó9 pack but when I reached a certain level,  the game stopped working after that and I've tried over and over again to go in but the game just keeps bring me back to the home screen and keeps stopping. Please fix it. I really want to play the remaining levels and packs

Great game. Keep coming back to it. I find it relaxing solving the puzzles, though it has become super easy! All versions are great. All in all, awesome job! One of my favourites, and works in any situation. Quick break at work, something productive ? Play. Something to do before sleep? Play. Got a few extra mins? Play! Wanna challenge yourself on timed? Play! Haha.

Was a great game until about 48 hours ago. I didn't mind the ads but now after every level I complete there's a video ad. Even then I would deal with it but it closes my music player. So after the ad I have to go to the music player and start it again but then when I switch back to the game I have to relaunch and reselect the level. Gets annoying to have to do after every level

Flow Free® is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow®. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Flow Free. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

★ Over 2,000 free puzzles

And they said i can catch the legendary shark with just a basic lure, well i was grinding at it like 8hrs a day and not even once. And my lure is fully upgraded and using PRO gear. SCAM!!! All that work 4nothing.

Crashes/freezes way too much to be worth my time. Oh, and be prepared to pour money into this game. Opponent "magically" catches a monster fish with 2 seconds left in every 1 on 1 match and wins. A complete scam and money pit.

Everything is pretty amazing tbh. But still some bugs that annoys me. Like this morning came 4th in championship but when silver pack was on its way my screen just went blue and nothing more happened.. Closed app restarted yet nothing.. And I mean ppl pay for buffs.so yeah I got ripped off. But overall amazing.

At the start you can play for about 1-2hrs; Then you have to wait for 8 more hours because you can't upgrade anything, or earn anything. From then on it's more of a chore then anything fun. The game starts out confusingly so lots will spend the free in game currency they give you, that you desperately need to speed up pack openings! Then before you even know how the game progresses they ask for a review, and reward the player for giving a 4 or 5 star rating(these are the only options). Not very admirable practice in my opinion! They have a solid foundation of a good "FTP" game; But seems like they are more interested in making money then developing a desirable gaming experience.

Very nice and clean interface, easy controls and after playing for hours, I have yet to see any ads. That means a lot to me and I feel more compelled to spend money with them just for not being hounded for it.

comments: I paid to get ad free.....STILL HAVE ADS! I like the game a lot. But if you have a button that gives you the option to pay for NO ADS, then you should get what you PAID for. The game itself is a lot of fun. I enjoy it a lot and its great time killer. But NOT getting what I PAID FOR does not make me a happy customer. This issue needs to be addressed and fixed.

I 9/10 love this companies games however this game has Flaws. You will have nothing that hits the bottom and it will say game over. I am not happy with it ! The ads literally make you click on it and then take you to Google Play store to download it which is very annoying. I would not download it not a good one.

Way too many ads. Every two games you get 30 seconds of advertisment. At one point an ad popped up during my game and made me lose. Played this for 5 minutes and uninstalled, dont even bother to download the game.

Like previous reviews said; great game but the problem is with the ads. I PAID for the ads to be removed and it did nothing. In my opinion an ad after every game is over kill. Like the other Voodoo games. Have the ad bar like every other game, then when someone hits the save me button that is when you force someone to watch the ad. It's a give and take scenario that has worked very well for other games. I'll waste 30 secs of my life to have a second chance but I will not after every game.    I am very annoyed that I paid money to remove ads and they didn't fix it. Ratings like this will continue if you do not fix this issue asap

I always play games with music in the background and while playing this game my music would be constantly shut off because of the ads, I don't mind the ads themselves, just the fact that it constantly interrupts other sounds playing on the system is very irritating. Gave you 2 stars for a nice game, didn't play a lot though so couldn't tell you more.

I paid for the game, because why not? I enjoy VooDoo's games. But please tell me as to why even though I purchased this particular game I'm still getting it riddled with ads? And it's already beginning to to tick me off. Come on, fix this. I understand the ads if I wamt to continue my score, but I paid for pop-ups and other ads to dissappear entirely. It'll get a better score when the issue is resolved.

comments: This game is literally rigged so that you only win 50-60% of your matches.  You can only advance by continuing to actually play, they will purposely match you with opponents you can't beat then once you have a few losses they give you easy opponents to run over.  The pattern has become so predictable that it's annoying.  One moment you'll win  5 matches then immediately lose 5.  Boring, predictable, rigged.  The formula reminds me of Hearthstone

Nice game to play during your free time. One thing I found a bit annoying is the chest. U have to wait for 1 chest to open only then u can start another chest and wait for another 4/8 + hours to unlock that chest. Why can't wait for some hours to open all the chests simultaneously? Pls give it a thought.

A Good game  If only there were some private mission or some things would have been challenging and intriguing. And waiting for a chest box to open is really awful. It would be great if there was an upgrade system without the chest it would make things more better.

Its a bit og a joke, got to 1000 trophys in a flash and now stuck between 1100-1300 for weeks. Highly inconsistent with cards opposition have same cards but serm to get to use them way faster then you. A ploy to get u to buy coims probaby against bots

Loving it, what a surprise!!!!! I was not expecting this game to be a blast to play. It's only been 30mins since I downloaded this app..... I'm so pleased I did. What are you waiting for???? I'm just a guy who will tell you the truth as to whether I like something or I don't. Sadly it's been awhile since I have had  that excited stupid look on my face, believe it's very silly looking and I love it. Cheers and thanks to the folks who put the hard work in to create this piece of joy.

Mediocre game, extremly unbalanced, especialy come time for competions for prizes. You can barley make the castle requirement to compete and they pair you up aginst players who have top tier cards from the last castle. The only way to realy progress is to spend money. I spent 30 dollars and pushed up a little bit but not alot.  You would have to spend hundreds.

comments: I Love Everything About This Game. I Can Upgrade Everything and Get Far. I Save Soooooo Much Money And I Can Learn Quickly How To Cook & Level Up Very Fast. Before I Switched Over To A New Phone Plan I Realized A Very Awesome Little Technique They Have. If You Have A Connected Account No Matter What Phone You Get Your Levels Will Be Stored & Saved. I Was So Shocked. Overall I Love This Game. Most Definitely Will Recommend.

I think it would be better if you got more gems. You can barely win anything on that little slot machine. I also noticed that you no longer get gems for every day you log in to play. Sure, the money is nice but you can't upgrade with just the money you earn while playing. I spun that slot machine 80 plus spins and barely won anything. Do the gems even pop up as a winning combo? They used to but not anymore.

I like the mobile version better than the PC version because the touch screen works better than the mouse. I also love the food machine you can get for 12 diamonds. It's pricey but we'll worth the purchase. I kinda wish the pace of customers was a little bit slower so I had more time to prepare the food. I do wish however that I didn't need so many gems to upgrade every little thing. Or if I do need gems then maybe they could be easier to get instead of only getting 5 every time you level up. So, decrease the pace of customers and make the gems easier to get

I loved the game but after the first restaurant you need gems to upgrade things regularly and they do not come around often after the first restaurant. All the achievements are money based. Money is easy to come by and I have only won on the casino once and all the fun is lost grinding to make money to spend on the slot machine to try and get gems. I'm on the second restaurant and I'm bored of waiting for gems to upgrade now.

They should call the game Cooking Fever Lite just because that is honestly what you get with this game. Fun and addictive in the beginning, but eventually you realize the grind for gems has low yield and is largely chance based, and the rate of growth for your restaurants significantly lessens. It drains the appeal if you're looking for a fun freebie.

It would be nice for updated casino with new slot machine games and also some new restaurants.  Last one was quite sometime ago?  Are you still actively developing the game or you called it quits like some other games I had to uninstall because there was nothing left to do in them.  Just curious.....
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers‚Äô experience more personal and memorable ‚Äì just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don‚Äôt forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. description: A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.SummaryA brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?How to playThere is only one rule:"Connect all the points with just one line."It doesn't matter where you start.There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.When you get stuck, make use of a hint.StagesThere are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.You might think it's too easy early on.However, clearing the simple stages is also important.The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.These special lines will encourage your imagination.Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.You're sure to get hooked!!
descriptionHTML:
A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.
In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.
Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.

Summary
A brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.
When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?

How to play
There is only one rule:
"Connect all the points with just one line."
It doesn't matter where you start.

There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.
When you get stuck, make use of a hint.

Stages
There are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.
At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.
You might think it's too easy early on.
However, clearing the simple stages is also important.
The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.

Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.
These special lines will encourage your imagination.

Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.
You're sure to get hooked!!

descriptionHTML:

description: This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!>How to play?Place the pieces into board. descriptionHTML:
This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!
It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!

>How to play?
Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.
You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
summary: Amazing block game with a simple rule.
title: Puzzle Game

description: Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!
descriptionHTML:
Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!

Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!

Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!

You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!

Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!

As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.

So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!

comments: It's sad to see people complaining and giving bad reviews about crashing but not knowing it's probably because their device is  g a r b a g e. I have j3 6 which is pretty bad and still runs well. Very optimized, sleek game. Also alot of updated to keep the game fresh and the microtransactions are very fair.

Very fun game, wish it wasn't energy based, would definitely enjoy it more. The fishing is 'new' right now and i have to say the percentages are garbage. 75 percent is more like 50, 50 percent is like 10 percent,  25 percent is closer to 50. This is just my personal experience. The games is really fun though, expect to get annoyed with the fishing percentages however. Also energy gets spent super fast in this game, very fun yet very limited.

I fell in love with this game as soon as I opened it the first time. But there is a problem which forces me to give it a 2 star rating. It kicks me out of the game every 5 minutes and that way I can't get any progress done. I absolutely enjoyed the little playtime I got and I want to play it more but it won't let me. Great job otherwise devs!
Fun and amazing game, great time killer for me, I just love these pixelated games so much.. to be fair it sounds like it's more Terraria and pokemon mixed typa thing y'know.. 5 stars

Been playing this for about a week.  It's a lot of fun with a variety of different things to do.  Running out of energy for doing dungeons doesn't matter a lot as there are three or four other things to do in game that don't require energy.  Will be making a purchase to support the devs.  Good game!

The one and only terrible thing in this game is the energy system. The fact that you need to wait for half a day for the energy bar or to recharge is just way too much...  I would suggest having the quest to cost half the current energy.  The rest is okay to me
description: Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you‚Äôre the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!Key Features:*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. descriptionHTML:
Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.

Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.

Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you’re the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!

Key Features:
*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!
*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!
*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.
*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.
*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).
*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!
*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!
*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.
*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.
*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.

PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play.

comments: I really liked this game when it had only 20 seasons & I uninstalled it after finishing. I again installed it and started from the beginning and after completing 573 games & 1487 stars I am giving you just 2star rating because game lag all the time sometimes the ads got struck or maybe during rewind I lose my $1 but the game didn't rewind back instead crash and auto shutdown and I ahve to start the application again. Before adding 30th season please update your games stability it will be more useful.

Surprised at how good this game is... very clever concept and I'm only half an hour into it and I'm already hooked! Recommend it to anyone who's a fan of football, well in fact, anyone who's a fan of gaming in general... well worth checking out, chuffed I came across it. 5***** for all features from me. The developers really did a fine job. Get it now is my advice! Peace out people :)

Would like more customisation options for my character. This game keeps crashing for no reason and doesn't like to reward it's loyal users. It is a fun game if they just let you play it. Fun game, but the gold farming and inattentiveness to what the users want will ruin it. Great game, lots of potential if taken in the right direction, but WAY to glitchy.
Like most other games, there is too much effort to bait you into micro transactions. The older games were so much better. It's a shame the Devs have resorted to such money grabbing standards.

I like the tactic aspect of it, pretty good time waster. Took me a while to beat it, but didn't have to spend a dollar to do it. The story itself is very unrealistic and after 15 seasons I completely stopped following it and focused only on the games.

There should be a full match game like this that isn't scripted. I love it! Should be an energy free mode maybe? As its a bit pay to win\microtransaction heavy.  They've made some changes, if you like ads and Facebook popping up after everything you do, then this is the game for you, dropped my rating 1 star as a result.  Also took out the ability to watch adverts for in game currency, now you have to pay. Even more of a cash grab now.

comments: I was searching for a new game to play now that I got a better phone. This is the first game of its kind for me. Can't wait to see what other games like this exist, but this one is by far the simplest and best. Some of the prices for stuff is outrageous. My only warning is to not spend money on items that will become useless later. The game constantly changes depending on your current level. 5/5 *

I LOVE this game My only complaint is in campaign mode it's said more worlds coming soon for YEARS!!! If they're not going to add a world eny time soon  they should at least change the coming soon part. But overall this is a good game and it seems like Cubic Games really care about what the consumers think.

I think this game is brilliant. An absolute pleasure to play and I never get bored. This game should be voted one of the best games ever. Obviously I like other games but this is a whole different story. I just wanted to say please make it so u can join lower levels friends? I can't join my sister and were only five levels apart.

This game has some faults (microtransactions and pay to win) but overall is amazing. Doesn't need a powerful phone to play, can occupy you for hours, and can help you meet new people. I got this game a month ago and haven't stopped playing since. This is one of my favorite games of all time, over all devices and consoles. I highly encourage you to download this game if you enjoy minecraft-styled graphics and multiplayer fps. And surprisingly there is a truck load of customization: Clan Forts, Home Base, Skin Editor, Armor, Weapons, and Pets. Sandbox has lots of toxicity but is tolerable. Overall 10/10 and a must-get for try hards and casual gamers alike.

once u reach high lvl gems are litteraly near impossible to get. Please add a way where you can buy gems with coins and vice versa also event keys with gems or coins, overall a good game but definitely a pay to win game which I really hate. Also more campaign would be nice as it is promised in the end of the 3rd world.

This used to be really cool. If you want to be strong buy gem weapons. It is too hard too earn coins or.gems. Also your opponents must be with same armor or level. I once fought a guy with the minigun shotgun and diamond armor and before I rekt everyone with the demoman but now it sucks
description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  ‚Ä¢ WORLDWIDE and local.  ‚Ä¢ unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  ‚Ä¢ Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  ‚Ä¢ Up to 8 players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! ‚Ä¢ Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  ‚Ä¢ Up to 4 Players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Chat is available as well! ‚Ä¢ 8 special maps. ‚Ä¢ Hardcore gameplay.  ‚Ä¢ Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is ‚Äúface to face‚Äù with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ A new training camp for first-timers.  ‚Ä¢ More detailed graphics.‚Ä¢ New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. ‚Ä¢ Cool new songs‚Ä¢ More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  ‚Ä¢ A lot of absolutely different maps.  ‚Ä¢ Many types of zombies and enemies.  ‚Ä¢ Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  ‚Ä¢ Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  ‚Ä¢ Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîThis is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.
descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!The game currently features 4 game modes: Defuse, Team Deathmatch, Ranked Games, and Gun Game.In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.In ranked games, the players are awarded points for every game that they win.Gun Game is a game mode that is played in teams, but all players individually work their way through all the weapons in the game.Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase comes to customize your favourite weapons.Follow us on social media:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGameYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEntDiscord: http://discord.gg/criticalopsPrivacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter?

Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience a critical antiterrorist operation. Fight for domination alongside your friends or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!

The game currently features 4 game modes: Defuse, Team Deathmatch, Ranked Games, and Gun Game.
In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.
In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.
In ranked games, the players are awarded points for every game that they win.
Gun Game is a game mode that is played in teams, but all players individually work their way through all the weapons in the game.

Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase comes to customize your favourite weapons.

Follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEnt
Discord: http://discord.gg/criticalops

Privacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/
Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/

comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I'm very upset with this game. I've been playing it for more than two months. I've put a lot of time and effort into this game and I made sure to play it every day for the rewards. Unfortunately, the game started glitching so I uninstalled it  and reinstalled it and all my work is gone. All my money is gone. It's very unfornate. I refuse to start from level one when I was one level 22. I loved this game. Not anymore. üò§

It's a great game at first, but it takes so long to upgrade or save money or anything that you end up spending a lot of your real life money. Plus the surgeries all start to be the exact same, and the glitches... oh, the glitches. Zapped $200,000 out of my bank, and that bloody epinephrine shot is impossible to get without striking out. Oh, and $120,000 for research that will only make you $4,000? Why is everything so time and resource consuming???

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

Let your app data be backed up... My old phone has to be replaced and after a lot of work everything was still not saved. I feel this is a pretty simple thing to have included and a dumb thing to leave out. Fail. Thanks for taking my money and running.

Player beware: Spil Games refuses to provide a list of in-game purchases you've made. Your inventory and currency will never be secure or held to account. Imagine a store refusing to issue a receipt! Sad! RESPONSE TO SPIL GAMES REPLY: You claim nothing went wrong on your end. Actually something did: I noticed less hearts than I should have had. The point is that there would be no way to investigate this error because you refuse to be transparent. Maybe you should work for Trump. You would fit right in.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristicsüöë  Play the most realistic surgery simulationsüöë  Build your own hospitalüöë  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save livesüöë  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research departmentüöë  Dive into two captivating seasons üöë  Stay tuned! We‚Äôre continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You‚Äôll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

comments: Why I liked it? Because it's a simple game that doesn't make you addicted to phone but rather enjoy going forward focusing your attention entirely on your finger. What comes to music as I read in comments, I always play games without music so haven't listened to this game's. I play this game as a reward after working hard and I'm entirely satisfied. There have been no crashes so far. Lots of ads, though.

I mean the game in itself is......alright  it could be a lot better.  I think the controls are rubbish and I understand it's meant to be "skillfull" but thats harder than skillfull, you can't even see where the circle is, this also adds to the game being bad. Having said all this you have also added rubbish music..... like you could have put something decent on. I get even more of an urge to uninstall the game every time I play it. Overall I definitely do NOT recommend this game. Game developers I hope you read this as it will probably help you to make the game better. I understand it would take a while but I don't care. If any of the game developers want to feedback on my feedback you are welcome to.Thank you.
It's a good game but... it's annoying cuz I keep falling because where the dot is I have to put my finger over it to move so I can't see where I am going.
This is game is ok if you are bored and don't know what to do.... however it becomes irritating after playing for a while.... overall its a nice game
I would like to report a bug. When you pause the game, moving obstacles keep moving. Someone would use this as a cheat
It is a great and fun game. Challenging and it works on your patience and timing. However it deleted all my progress for some reason and I lost all of the obstacles I unlocked, which was a lot

comments: Once you get to the higher levels, it gets really expensive, and each game costs coins. Sometimes it takes up to 10 tries to pass a level. There should be another way to earn coins. Beautiful game, love to play, just too expensive, and any bought coins don't last long cause losing is so costly. Too bad because it's a fun game.  Could you please tell me what the incentive is to continue? Even when you make more money with more crops, it then costs more money to play.   I don't imagine you'll respond, but I hope so.

Love the game but I think the bonus levels to unlock gold crops should be heaps cheaper to play. Some of them are hard and you run out of money to keep trying them as they cost as much as a normal level to play.

It looks good and the gameplay is fun. Unfortunately that fun only lasts so long before the game devolves into micro transaction hell. Each round gets so expensive that I can only play one or two unless I were to buy coin packs. These guys should be ashamed.

I'm in the 60's level and find it very difficult to accumulate sufficient points to maintain play for longer than two or three games and that is after accumulating a days worth of "harvest now" points which requires your interaction every hour at this level and no play. You have to win at least a couple games without using the free points to purchase additional cards or wild cards, opening up as many cards as possible for as many options and longer streaks, and playing some of the "cheaper (points wise)" and easier glade challenges. Winning a games without additional cards barely gets you above where you started and any add'l cards drain you quickly even if you win to the point that you lose all and you have to accumulate another day of points for another 15 minutes of play.  Bonuses are just too slow in coming and wins just don't count for much. I love the peaceful backgrounds and graphics though.

I liked this  game, but each game cost to much to play and you go through credit to fast.  $500 a game, then it goes up pretty fast to $1000 a game, then to $1500 a game, etc... plus reply as wild cards cost a lot.  There are other solitaire   games that are less frustrating  I  would rather play.
I CANT STOP PLAYING, LOSING SLEEP. WAITING FOR THE NEXT NEW LEVELS. DON'T STOP CREATING.

comments: This is a jewel in the Talking Tom series.  I am an adult, and I am thoroughly hooked!  I have to be on every day to do the daily challenge, no matter my schedule.  The snowboard side world is amazing.  I have never been able to ride a skateboard, much less a snowboard, but I admire the snowboarders and skateboarders who can.  With this world, I can, and it feels real!  My only caveat is that after Ben's world, there are no more new houses to conquer and work on.  So I earn gold bars and diamonds for nothing.   We advanced players need more houses!  Make Tom a vacation home or hunting cabin, I don't know!   Anyway, love the graphics, even the side ones as I run by don't go unnoticed.

I've got a new phone. All my other games have been put on this device and they are all restored from where I left off from. This game won't let me and I have to start from the beginning which isn't right as I also recently spent money on a character.. put my previous game data back up
Super fun!! You go through sooo many places!! However, the controls are really bad. It's soo choppy. It takes like a hour to load!

Sometimes it's been my favourite game ever but I don't why it is worst controls in all games and it is hanging a lotttt. According to my previous rating I gave it all 5 stars but now I'm giving only 3 stars just becoz of controls just only this.......plz fix this becoz I love these graphics a lott and I have very high scores too. I have sufficient and enough space in my phone and my all other apps are going good but just becoz of this all apps are reacting and it takes a lot of space and hanging a lotttttttt. Plz fix it so that I also give it 5 star rating.üòï
I love it. But the only thing DON`T like is turns around while he is runing. Then you hit somthing because you were destracted.üò†üò†
I think this developed because of true story once 36 years ago a theif  came to a house the watchman was in the garden he don't know the theif stole all gold so this story is developed as a game

So, get ready to go for the gold in this exciting SIDE WORLD. Or test your snowboarding skills in the Snowboard Side World! Race snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let‚Äôs run for fun this winter! ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖENJOY THE FUN OF TALKING TOM GOLD RUN‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖENDLESS FUN: With endless running, racing, and snowboarding, the fun never ends!!!MISSIONS AND REWARDS: Win missions to get cool rewards! Race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the SPECIAL NEW CHARACTER, PRINCESS ANGELA! She lives in a magical place called MEDIEVAL TOWN. So, get ready to go for the gold in this exciting SIDE WORLD.

comments: Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

For a shoot 'em up racing android game it's really addictive. I'm always playing it. It's fun. My only complaint is the time it takes for the fuel to charge, 30 mins? Come on! Otherwise very challenging. Challenge accepted!

I really enjoyed this game until it started crashing mid game. Happened to me just recently and I wasted all my available fuel trying to frantically restart the game.  I was just completing the assigned jobs when the game suddenly stalled and I had to restart it again just to find it stalling again, all the while consuming the fuel with each restart. Hope to see this problem rectified soon, otherwise it's an enjoyable game nonetheless.
description: THEY TOOK YOUR CITY. descriptionHTML:
THEY TOOK YOUR CITY. THEY SHOULD’VE TAKEN YOUR CAR!

Reclaim your No.1 position as you blast past other players and outrageous gang bosses in Fastlane: Road to Revenge!

Pick-up this FREE classic arcade shooter and play anytime OFFLINE!

BUST OUT THE BIG GUNS
• 20 exotic cars to collect and upgrade.
• 10 unique & powerful UAVs.
• Game changing vehicle transformations to rain destruction on your rivals: Talon Gunship, Vulcan S-22, Tempest C-3.
• More gear and gadgets than Elon Musk!

CHALLENGE PLAYERS WORLDWIDE
• Blast your way past players the world over.
• Overtake rivals to steal their score bonus.
• Race through 30 player leagues with escalating difficulty.
• Challenging environments and lethal obstacles.
• Can you reclaim your status as top boss?

RICH STORY CAMPAIGN
• 11 crazed bosses hell bent on stopping you in your tracks.
• Complete the campaign and reveal the identity of the boss who took over your turf.

HUGE SOUNDTRACK
• Actual in-game radio allows you to select your own beats.
• Wide selection of in-game music.


Please note that Fastlane is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases. You can play Fastlane offline but a network connection is required for in-app purchases and League Promotion.

_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.fastlaneroadtorevenge.com/
Follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook to get info about upcoming Fastlane changes:
https://www.facebook.com/fastlaneroadtorevenge/
https://twitter.com/FastlaneRTR/

recentChanges: For Gus our beloved Pug, it has been a long journey. He has been to many places, seen many things, and crashed into far too many rockets.
In this bumper update he is bringing you experiences from around the world with a huge series of events, stay tuned to play them all!
We‚Äôve also spent some time at the gas pumps and made it easier than ever to refuel your car.
Now go take back the city!
summary: Fastlane: The best new SHOOT 'EM UP that will entertain you for HOURS! üî•üî•üî•
title: Fastlane: Road to Revenge

comments: FIFA mobile peaked with FIFA 14 in almost every way. It had career mode, better controls, more realistic have gameplay and better ultimate team. It's a real shame you can't play it any more. Another thing they had always been lacking from FIFA mobile is the ability to properly customize how your team plays. This means the player who wins is the one who can best adapt to how EA had set the team up to play. This makes the game less rewarding as I do not like my teams to play in the way that EA ways them to. üòîüòî

In the vs attak mode if i lose a game i lose 8000 fans and if i win it i get only 6000 fans. It is a great game but this is a problem. More over in some matches i donot get great chances to score while the opponent gets 10 great chances. It very unfair. Many times if the game hasn't started and my server crashes i loose the match and stamina. And i cannot play the game for a hole day because of server problem evenif my internet connection is quiet strong.  Execpt this everything is gr8.

I request the developers to consider the following points... 1.The team can't be substituted while playing season games. 2.The game shows unknown errors sometimes while playing and crashes. 3.It would be good if getting the elite players become easier.. Rest it's surely one of the best game of EA and undoubtedly for the football lovers..Keep updating... I would like it more if you improve the physics of the game like curving the ball etc....please make it....

The only I wanted to tell is that the game shows that the master players are very rare and we have a chance of getting them but trust I have been playing fifa for a lot of time and I never got like a player in like chance or in free packs I do not even get silver players. So I suggest that you increase the chances of getting these kind of players.

At first when I down loaded it I thought it would be a cheap version of real FIFA that you often have to pay for. I expected bad graphics, crashes and lots of bugs. I WAS WRONG!!! This game is literally the best ever. 01.03.18 Although in the new update I went to type something on leagues and the game just crashed, it also made my phone spam so I had to shut it down and reload my phone up, please investigate this.

You have to add these 3 things please...,.......... 1.Adding commentary will make this game an real editors choice game. 2.Getting good players is lot of hard than u think so find a way. 3. Most important......... Loading. It's the biggest problem almost every players experiences so please keep these in mind which will make this game the best
description: FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you‚Äôll ever experience! Get a free Cristiano Ronaldo item to start building and managing your team. Train any player to superstar status, attack opponents, and keep coming back for daily content all season long. Plus, get into the game on the go with a download size of under 100 MB. Whether you‚Äôre a savvy veteran or just starting out on the pitch, FIFA Mobile is your source for soccer.BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM‚Ñ¢Develop the most competitive squad when you choose any 11 players from over 550 real teams, including stars from past and present, and train them to over 100 OVR. Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team. ATTACK TO WINTake on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round. KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTSStay connected to real-world soccer as it happens across the globe. Test your skills in single-player Campaign mode, then challenge yourself with uniquely themed Events where you can earn incredible prizes.JOIN A LEAGUE, CONQUER THE WORLDParticipate in Leagues, a truly social experience that allows you to join forces and strive for glory with friends and gamers around the globe. Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA‚Äôs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don‚Äôt want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/enVisit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days‚Äô notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.
descriptionHTML:
FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you’ll ever experience! Get a free Cristiano Ronaldo item to start building and managing your team. Train any player to superstar status, attack opponents, and keep coming back for daily content all season long. Plus, get into the game on the go with a download size of under 100 MB. Whether you’re a savvy veteran or just starting out on the pitch, FIFA Mobile is your source for soccer.

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM™
Develop the most competitive squad when you choose any 11 players from over 550 real teams, including stars from past and present, and train them to over 100 OVR. Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team.

ATTACK TO WIN
Take on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round.

KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTS
Stay connected to real-world soccer as it happens across the globe. Test your skills in single-player Campaign mode, then challenge yourself with uniquely themed Events where you can earn incredible prizes.

JOIN A LEAGUE, CONQUER THE WORLD
Participate in Leagues, a truly social experience that allows you to join forces and strive for glory with friends and gamers around the globe. Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.

This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.

User Agreement: http://terms.ea.com
Privacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/en
Visit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.
EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.
developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges: This mid-season update introduces an abundance of gameplay improvements to continue delivering the quality of experiences you demand, including:
- All-new Squad Building Challenges, rolling out weekly
- Enhanced Leagues with improved ability to search, auto-join, and updated social features
- Full Winter Transfer roster updates complete
We‚Äôve also made some off-the-pitch enhancements to keep your game going strong. Thanks for playing!
summary: Get a free Ronaldo item and build your Ultimate Team to attack, score, and win!
title: FIFA Soccer

comments: Fun to play but the aiming control needs work. Accuracy is key in a game like this and the controls are  rather poor at times. Block values in upper levels become so high beating them is impossible. Ads are intrusive and very annoying.

A good little game for a boring bus ride or for buying time while waiting around

Something suspicious about this game. 1) why does it want access to make phone calls? 2) why does it want access to my pictures! 3) it pops up ads that look small on a black background but if you try clicking anywhere on the screen it acts like you clicked the ad.  The actual game plays ok, but not really anything special. Stay away from this game until they change the permissions they are asking for.  Ridiculous.

comments: Wont open load or do anything even with newest update please fix! Every time there is an update it messes up and won't load the levels I'm on. Frustrated because I love the game itself. Getting so mad it won't load every single time it updates! I was trying to get to 1500 before my birthday fat chance in hell now.

I would give this game 5 stars because I do love playing it. But it gives bonus's daily that are supposed to last 2 hours and mine have only been lasting 15 minutes! I have contacted them multiple times and they still haven't fixed it.

Loved this game. Very addictive. But just like other recent reviews, since March 2018 problems with no help at all from company. Have not received about 4 gift boxes or rewards for at least 4 levels even tho i completed them. Doesnt advance either. I have to search what level i stopped at. On one of my devices says no internet connection and sent me back. Have stopped playing on that device. Contacted company twice to no avail. Will search for a new game with totally different company

Do not waste your money on the game. I use to enjoy it and had no problem paying for things. I believe a company should make money if they do their job. Since it was sold to a new owner they no longer answer anyone's questions. They send you to a link that has everyone else scrambling for answers. They also do not replace items you lose when the game has problems. They do not care if you purchased them. The old company use to replace items and gold bars when it was the games glitches. They actually cared about the people playing it. The owners now can not even be bothered to reply. If you play it only get the free stuff. Do not waste your hard earned money on this game. They will not spend any time to make sure you get what you paid for

While you have infinite lives a great time waster. Also great if you want to spend silly amounts of money on a few power ups that  won't get you through the hard levels. And all the 'are you sure you want to quit instead of buying some more gold bars/candy hammers/whatevers' just make even trying to quit a level tiresome. If it takes too many attempts to pass a level I get bored, and that is where I am today. Bye.
Why did bubblegum hill disappear in the middle of the day today? Also the power ups are not staying the allotted amount of time either? I've spent money on this app but won't spend anymore!
description: Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! descriptionHTML:
Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! Switch and match candies to create 3 in a row, or match 4 (or more) to make delicious special candies! Complete the goals before you run out of moves to progress through deliciously fun levels. It's that simple!

Switch and match scrumptious candies to make mouth-watering combinations and play challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and Candy Bears! Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

New Candy Crush Soda Saga features: 

* Over 1000 Sodalicious levels
* New Game Modes include:
Soda – switch bottles and candies to release purple soda and save the Candy Bears
Frosting – match candies to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free
Honey – match candies next to the honey to release the trapped Candy Bears
* Scrumptious new candies and sublime new combinations:
Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish
Match 7 candies to create the remarkable Coloring Candy
* Explore juicy new environments and meet the kookiest characters
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush never looked so tasty
* Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master
* For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Sodalicious scores
* Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Are you already a fan of the new Candy Crush Soda Saga?  If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

www.candycrushsodasaga.com
facebook.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga 
twitter.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Soda Saga!

comments: I like it and it is a good game, except now I have no sound and the videos do not leave the screen so I can spin the wheel. The sound on the game is on and the last time it worked properly was 3 days ago. I have to shut down the game for me to get the ads gone and still no sound. I have lost many chests and many coins this way. I updated the game and still nothing. Please fix because I have no idea what is going on.

Great game with fun objectives that keep it challenging until level 15.  Only issue with it is that ive recently lost all.my gems due to some sort of bug and now i dont really want to continue playing just to get back to 500 gems to experience something other than sky summit.

The blazing sand map is really boring. Only 3 different location there. But looks same all the entire run. Make some free space. It is very boring to run in sand all the time. Make variation like Frozen Shadows atleast. Add some location. Make some variations.

Would have been a 5 on gameplay and overall, but as you move up the levels, the daily challenges are more difficult to achieve. For example, I have been trying to survive five tunnels in the lost jungle for four days now, but never get to run in the tunnels. I had a run today of over 20k meters and didn't run in the tunnels once during that run. Otherwise, great game, but the gameplay manipulates it so that daily goals are harder to achieve as you advance.
Game is excellent. But though I completed all challenges daily quests. indicating all with green ticks. It is showing collect two more keys. How tricky and fraudulent
Can play offline sometimes.  Problem with that!  Previously uninstalled cuz I got fed up.  Give it a try again so well see
