comments: It's casual, relaxing and fun. Super cute. And it has 2 huge pluses: first of all it feels rewarding since you actually have a realistic possibility of getting new fluffies; second, you don't have ads shoved in your face every 5 seconds, in fact you pretty much never see them.  Really great at the moment, hope it stays this way. Lots of respect to the Devs for staying away from annoying cash grab techniques.

this game is adorable. the only thing i'm not quite sure about is the rainbow system; what does it do? how does it work? it would be great to have a page that explains the details to those of us who aren't great at working this stuff out. i'd also like to ask why there aren't plushies for these things??? they're so cute! i'd by tons of they were real. anyway, great game, and the little fluffy cubes are the sweetest things and i just want to hug them all.

I love the fact that you can unlock new characters in different catagorys the graphics are great and the idea is awesome. The only thing bad about it is the game play add some treasure bonus or something like that to keep the players from not getting bored a bit. Also it glitches a little bit sometime and it prevented me from getting my high score. Anyways I love the game very addictive to try and get every fluffy and rainbow fluffy Love it but how is it a rainbow fluffy? Anyways LOVE the game very addictive

There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

ADORABLE! THE FLUFF'S FACES ARE JUST SO CUTE! But that isn't why you're reading this. Over all a good, simple game. Getting new fluffs is similar to crossy road, but it's kinda like a Minecraft dropper map. My only complaint is that the fluff is so big it's hard to see what's coming up, but that does add to the challenge.

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45.  I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! üòäüíï

I also think it is cool to have different battlefields and different robots to choose from! I like it when you make more robots for people to buy and put into battle. I wished that everyone would play this game. But, I was wondering if you could lower the prices for the special robots and guns? Thanks!  From, JulianüôÇüòé

Reminds me of the mechs from some Animes. Fun. Easy to upgrades mechs and weapons by watching videos and going into open battles. Haven't joined a clan yet. Been playing for about two months now. The only complaint I have is facing lvl 30 players with lvl 12 Mk II mechs and weapons that clearly belong in higher leagues. I understand Pixonic's loyalties lay with their paying customers first. Because it costs money  to develop new mechs, weapons, and maps.  But something needs to be done about the Tankers. A week in the LP queue doesn't seem to be enough to discourage Tanking.  I still believe that the game is fun. And I won't let cheaters discourage me. Sooner or later I'll be up there in higher levels myself.

This is the longest running game I have on my phone...so that should tell you something. It's fun don't get me wrong but it started out as a great game but has now changed to a 2 star game due to the fact that they keep on making it more and more a pay to play game. If they keep going down this route I will need to quit. I don't mind paying for a good game but in game purchases are getting crazy.

Love this game. Very close to mech warrior. Some things need to be worked on I'm such as how long it takes to upgrade some stuff is kinda slow. Hoping they make a way to upgrade 2 things at a time. Then also need to make matches a little more even as far as weps and team. In due time I hope but other than that I play it all the time!

Why is the Pursuer in the pic with the Mercury and Hellburner but not in the game? Also, I think you should make some of the new bots/weapons, or old component bots/weapons, purchaseable with Gold and/or Workshop points, as in buying the whole bot/weapon with Gold/Workshop points. Being in the offers is not enough because they almost always come with unwanted components for other weapons/bots that we don't want. Anyway, great game overall, my little brother and I really enjoy playing this game :)

300$ for a new Robot Inquisitor. And 200$ for each of other new robots Haechi for   example. And no real way to obtain earn these new weapons and robots by playing the game. Only by money. The situation was bad already but now it is catastrophic. I dont understand what Pixonic is doing. There is no future in this direction. It is wrong decision. It will provide money for them in short term but it wont lust long.

descriptionHTML:
War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 34 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 30 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?

Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.
Enjoy the game!

comments: Very Cool Game... I just started playing this game and I'm having a lot of fun.  I Love the üéè in the background.  I wish all card games could have backgrounds.  It makes the game more fun to play.  Not that were not addicted already... LoL!  I also like the fact that the cards are big enough to see.  For my Ole' eyes.  I love the daily challenges as well.  It's so much fun!  More games should be like this one.  I highly recommend it! üòé

Way too many ads. A lot of the ads run for 15 secs or more and you can't cancel them until they are finished. Many of the other ads that display in the bottom of the screen make the game unresponsive a lot of the time. Would have preferred the opportunity to purchase the game to remove the ads. Pity there is no option for -5 stars. I hate apps that force ads on you without options to remove them.

I like to play in landscape mode.  The pictures displayed of this are NOT what is displayed on your screen.   In landscape mode you get almost the portrait sized positioning of the cards just flipped sideways.   Very cramped and uncomfortable play no matter what pretty theme you are on.   I am having trouble finding a fun relaxed plenty of room app to play solitaire, but I do know there are others filling the total landscape screen without themes that I enjoy playing more than this,  sorry to say.   I am more sorry that I wasted my time with this.

I like it,  just when I try to do daily challenges I get this ad that tells me to wait for a while..... That kind of makes me NOT want to play.  If you can fix that,  I'll give a better rating.  Thanks üòä

The colorful scenes are awesome! Fish are my favorite. I just had a problem that when I did a daily challenge the rating placard would pop up but I had to totally exit my game and restart to clear it. Everyone says way too many ads but it's giving us a break to drink coffee or run to the bathroom! Just like commercials on TV.üòú

First of all, the game wants you to rate it by the second hand. You don't have the option to, "rate it later" like on other games. That way they get better ratings because everyone loves the graphics. There's more to a game than graphics people. Some of the ads are very long and others are just plain inappropriate. You only win about 1 in every 10 hands. The game cheats and the daily challenge is a rip off. The "magic" option rarely helps in any way. I have played many different Solitaire game apps and this one is the second worst of them all.

comments: I absolutely love love LOVE this game. Im no bot i swear. This game is so addictive. Gameplay is great. A few suggestions however. Sometimes i find my "sword" just going right through some fish, and it doesnt kill them. Also, maybe switch up some ways to get Stars. I find myself saving so much to get the 99k sword fish and never buy any other fishes. I feel like the players should work their way up slowly and not have to play with only the "daily reward" fishes. Just my suggestion  Thank you guys!

Smash was a bit too hard since its such a small area with way too many people, the boost reload time should be decreased by about 0.2s, and you should make the stars more easier to get. But overall the game is pretty good

Great game, good servers, rarely any lag, and addicting. However, the price for characters is pretty steep, their not even worth buying since you'll get better daily characters by the time you have enough stars to buy a good character. Save up for the end game characters. Also, the left joystick is fairly close to the edge of the screen and makes it a little hard to stay on the screen. You get use to it after a while but it would be nice to have other control setups or custom controls.
Great game. Just the spawns on Kill the King and stuff suck since people can spawn right in you. Also, it is kinda rigged when you have the default fish vs someone with one of the best ones.
Great game! However it crashes a lot for me. Almost every game when I did the entire app crashes. Would love a fix for this thanks
Great game, its so addicting!  But there is only 1 problem, theres so much lag. Pls fix!! :)
description: Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other. Dash to your enemy and kill them!Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!HOW TO PLAY:Control with Joystick your direction.Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.  * Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here. So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.*Attention this app requires good internet connection!* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
descriptionHTML:
Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other.
Dash to your enemy and kill them!
Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.
In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!

HOW TO PLAY:
Control with Joystick your direction.
Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).
Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.

Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:
* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.
* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.
* Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !
* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.
* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .
* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here.

So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!
Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.

*Attention this app requires good internet connection!
* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
developerAddress: Suit 14, Park Lane 55, London, W1K1NA
recentChanges: Fixed bugs
summary: Dash to your enemy and kill them! Pixel cute creatures piercing each other.
title: Pixel Sword Fish io

A great game and extremely addictive once you really get into it. Well thought out. It can be very time consuming but that is what makes it great. The grind to level up Heroes makes me want to come back and carry on, unlock other heroes and further upgrade my Kingdom. My only issue is the fact that resources are hardly able to be kept. Being under constant attack from other groups and unable to allow my Kingdoms walls to regenerate properly before I am able to move again seems to be a recurring issue and one I do feel needs to be looked at and tweaked. Nonetheless, I'm impressed with the game. Continue with the good updates and this game could be one of the best mobile games out there.

Hello dev... Please try to solve the duelling problems. I got stuck every time someone challenge a duel with me. I cant even use any of my heroes ability. And many are having this problem. Please try to fix this issue as soon as possible or im not spending another dime in this game... And please don't bother replying back with send a text to our page on fb or etc coz it takes decades to get a reply so just freaking solve this issue please. Thanks

descriptionHTML:
You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.

Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.

Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.

GAMEPLAY
- Why is his hair on fire? Who cares, just RUN!
- Quickly wipe your screen free of puke
- Balance that wobbling glue eater
- Flick the piranhas out of range of those precious private parts
- Swat wasps before it's too late
- Best not invite that psycho killer inside
- Carefully remove forks from toasters
- Help self-taught pilots
- Get back from the edge of the platform you fools
- Have patience at level crossings
- No crossing the tracks! Not even for balloons!
- And who knew rattlesnakes were so picky about mustard?
- Doing your own electrical work? Choose the wires carefully
- Mind the gap! Board the train safely
- Space is no fun without a helmet. Put it on now!
- Stop the clothes dryer. It’s a terrible hiding place!
- Scratched the drug dealer’s ride, now avoid his bat
- Taking expired medicine is not recommended
- Stitch it up before bleeding out!
- Perform a daring rescue from a burning building
- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents
- Remember to stop at level crossings
- Everyone loves bacon! Even rattlesnakes!
- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit
- Only cross at pedestrian crossings
- Remember the sequence for a fireworks show
- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash
- Sprung a leak? Sprint to the shore!
- Tap to tip toe to the ice cream
- Keep the wasp nest from hitting the ground
- Avoid eating rotten food
- Leap over forest obstacles
- Screw down the glue cap
- Find the psycho before he finds you!
- Smash the asteroids
- Hunt for treasure, but don’t get hunted yourself
- Ready, aim, and fire yourself onto an opposing galleon
- Walk the plank, but don’t fall over
- Barricade your home to stave off zombies
- Follow the recipe to brew the perfect potion
- Feed the bear candy before he feeds on you
- Build the perfect snowman, but watch out for pointy carrots
- Pouring drinks from a rickety ladder is inadvisable
- Time your jump or get stuck in a chimney
- Package the chocolates or feel love’s bite
- Don’t Dumb with scissors
- Drive up to a scenic lookout (but make sure to brake)

PLUS
- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station
- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!

Watch the original Webby and Cannes award-winning video here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJNR2EpS0jw

recentChanges: Love is in the air! Our friends have discovered even more Dumb Ways to Die in three new mini-games!
HEARTS AND CRAFTS ‚Äì Calamity is working her heart out on a set of crafts. Keep her hand steady to make sure she doesn‚Äôt get too cut up.

comments: Love the concept. Some very niche games stall my progress, but it's been nice so far. Some suggestions if I may : Navigation could really use an overhaul, overall. It doesn't feel very smooth.  As an example : Say I scroll all the way down and pick a game to guess, going back puts me back at the top of the list. Also, previously unlocked hints seem to disappear when the exiting the app.

They made me misspell Rabbids, including "games" like Sword Art Online and Attack on Titan, and had obscure art that gave really bad visualization of very simple things. Just play a better trivia game. Moreover. Don't give us awful games like Unity, Watch Dogs, and League of Legends. Anime is anime. Video games are video games. Video game adaptations of anime are still, at there core, anime. Leave those out of these kinds of apps.

Overall super fun game and I'm really enjoying it, however some of these levels are really easy, and then there are others that are super challenging and nearly impossible to find out. I just wish there was a difficulty setting so you start off with easier games and then it could get harder as it progresses, because at the moment I can't pass 70% of the levels without using hints.

Legit only mobile games its not I gaming quiz. They could of at least put more console or pc games who would even know all of the mobile games out there.aswell if you don't know it you will have to watch a add that can be 1min long. You might as well just watch youtube or twitch.

Very great game, had me thinking of the gold old days of gaming. SPOILER: One issue I had was on the section of main characters where I did not sufficiently have the letters to spell Dragon Ball Xenoverse

Overall... Amazing game but some games are very obscure and others are blatant. I love these kinds of games and can't wait to see the next update, hopefully more games to guess from! I love the diversity of games though

Episode lets you LIVE your stories. One choice YOU make can change everything! The world’s largest home of visual stories where YOU choose your path. Or, become a creator and write your own! <3

Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 75,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter. You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?

Patheitc. Being such a fast paced game you cannot have the blocks starting to move a split second before you're going to pass it. Makes the game pretty impossible from the first level. comments: I Would Give It Five Stars...but...you should make it customizable for the colors you want to cycle through as you stack higher. THIS GAME IS NOT COLOR BLIND FRIENDLY. Great Idea Though, Nice Hand Eye Coordination Exercise. (I see Black and White, so a monochrome setting would be nice. Other people see colors differently as well) Needs A Color Cycle Customizer, or a set of different options for each type of Color Blind. Thanks in advance

Great simple game with AMAZING colours‚ù§ I love this...dead simple and fun. It took me ages to work out how to unlock the new skins...click on the banner that has the amount of diamonds you've collected and what looks like 3 sheets on top of one another  (it comes up before you press the start key...)

A Great Game For When You're Dumpin'. I decided to install it because I ran out of YouTube videos while droppin' a duce. I really enjoy and will be using it the next time I'm in here as well. The ads are there, but they aren't too bad and there is an option to remove them for a small fee as well (which I plan to do.) My time in the bathroom has flew by because of the game and I'm happy to say that. I don't like to stay too long. Great game!

So,  basically it's a pretty fun app to play when you're bored. It's a great time killer, and is very challenging, but at the same time easy! It's a perfect app! I remember I downloaded this, and then I uninstalled it because I needed other apps on my phone. And now I installed it again, so then I have a fun game to play. I don't really have any games on my phone, so this is the perfect one. The inventors are genius! Five stars!!

Challenging and aesthetically pleasing A well made, minimalist stacking game which takes a long time to master, with nice simple visuals, a satisfying game mechanic and good sound effects. The instant replayability makes for a good competitive game amongst friends. The only reason it doesn't have a 5* is because I feel more could have been added to it, and done with the mechanic.

Good, with a major flaw I've ran into an issue that occurs about 1 out of every 3 rounds, where I'll tap, and the game won't register the trap until well after the position I wanted. For a game based on timing and your ability to stack moving blocks, when you tap is important, and needs to be 100% reliable. I'm on a Nexus 6P, very new phone with excellent hardware. I've closed all background apps, to try and troubleshoot. It's an issue I'd like to see fixed.

comments: The concept is great and was actually quite fun, but the ads were over the top. There is a permanent ad banner that covers up a part of the game screen which is just horrible design. Also I opened the game up again and all my saved data was gone. I had unlocked 3 "world's" and poof all gone. That was the reason I uninstalled.

Amazing addictive game. Try it out! Not too many ads, and just the right amount of challenge without pulling your hair out. Sometimes there's a hidden dot in the title, or ones that are almost the same color as the background, but it's not bad enough to lose a star.

Updated with no fix...  problem still persists.  No exit button and controls for the back button are very wonky. Need to add dedicated exit button or fix what happens when you tap / swipe the blank park of the screen. Trying to bring the controls up from their hidden state selects options is frustrating. You end up starting games. Very unpolished controls, imo.

Great game! Relaxing and fairly simple with occasional challenging levels, exactly what I like in a mobile game.   One annoying thing  I would like to flag up to the developers is that in the new erasor and draw modes there is no way to know what colour you are, so you either have to guess or go back to the menu, which is very irritating, couple of ideas to fix; keep the progress bar at the bottom there whilst you are doing your moves, as you always play as the top colour. Or just a simple dialogue box or even a dot in  the corner that pops up as you start the round to tell you. Would be a much needed qol change.  Still gave 5 stars as the game is great, but a fix to this would be a welcome addition.

Fun, relaxing, thought-provoking in a very simple graphic. The ads are bad as they interrupt the mild tones and flow of the mini-puzzles. Over all very nice but needs more to be anything more than a time-killer

Cool game, only bad thing is that tutorial levels are rated as bronze so you can never have all gold.. I tried doing the same tutorial three times in a row, then it is counted as gold, but when you exit the game and enter again that it is bronze again
description: Lines ‚Äì Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. Challenge your brain, draw, cut and erase to find the solution to the 250+ smart levels. Relax, unwind and let the color flow into the labyrinth of lines, in a Zen experience that will let your mind flow free and antistress. Some levels have a perfect symmetry, other are a maze of lines. Can you master all of them? No pencil needed!How to play Lines ‚Äì Physics Drawing PuzzleDepending on the level, you will need to tap to place a dot over a line, erase and opponent¬¥s dot, cut or draw lines. Then watch the colors unfold and flow!Lines ‚Äì Physics Drawing Puzzle key features include:- 5 different modes: Point, Erase, Cut, Draw and Mix- Daily Challenges- 26 achievements to unlock-250 smart levels- Use your brain and logics to find the solutions- Bronze, Silver and Gold medals for each level.- Infinite fun!Point ModeTap over a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one, other two dots.Eraser ModeTap over an opponent¬¥s dot to erase it. Draw ModeDraw a line with your fingers to connect lines to your advantage. Use your brain!Cut Mode Cut a line to stop the flow of your opponent¬¥s color. Hope you all guys enjoy Lines ‚Äì Physics Drawing Puzzle! Created by our Dutch friends from Gamious!
descriptionHTML:
Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. Challenge your brain, draw, cut and erase to find the solution to the 250+ smart levels. Relax, unwind and let the color flow into the labyrinth of lines, in a Zen experience that will let your mind flow free and antistress. Some levels have a perfect symmetry, other are a maze of lines. Can you master all of them? No pencil needed!
How to play Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle
Depending on the level, you will need to tap to place a dot over a line, erase and opponent´s dot, cut or draw lines. Then watch the colors unfold and flow!

Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle key features include:
- 5 different modes: Point, Erase, Cut, Draw and Mix
- Daily Challenges
- 26 achievements to unlock
-250 smart levels
- Use your brain and logics to find the solutions
- Bronze, Silver and Gold medals for each level.
- Infinite fun!

Point Mode
Tap over a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one, other two dots.

Eraser Mode
Tap over an opponent´s dot to erase it.

Draw Mode
Draw a line with your fingers to connect lines to your advantage. Use your brain!

Cut Mode

comments: I used to love this game, very addictive but recent updates have made the game have too many elements (clubs - who cares???) Ads all over and money disappears quickly due to cost of each game.  Not easy to complete games it feels "fixed" with random cards plus drains the battery on my phone.  Uninstalled.

This is my 3rd review. Love the game but had issues when ads were introduced. That was rectified, then had issues with new Android version. That was fixed and game was going fantastically for about 3 weeks and now they have reduced the amount of free treasure to $1000 instead of $5000. This means I need to come back 3x more often without playing a single game just to be able to play once.

I would like it more if in the perk levels it showed how many club points were needed for each level and how many more are needed to finish the perk level. The green filling up the bar doesn't really accurately show how close you are. It looks like you are almost done, but then it takes forever to fill up so you don't know how many more points you need.

This game has many issues! It continually freezes and shuts me down. I can no longer play on my tablet, which I purchased just for games, and have to use my phone. I don't like using my phone because it drains my battery. I am so ready to quit this game and return to candy crush instead. Latest updates have rendered JP and other perks useless.

Originally I really liked this game BUT the further you go the  more it costs to play.  That was ok, but you add more and more ads in there, they are on the "boards" they are between the games, between the levels and NOW you have Tri Peaks Solitaire brought to you by, yet another game. I like it, as a game it's addictive and was  fun but I think I have had enough.  It's becoming not so much fun and headed for the uninstall list.

Way too many glitches and loss of coins/rewards. Money hungry gsn. Trying to get money from people in every which way possible. Ads are rediculous. Quit making changes to the game! Worse with every update! Will change my rating when they start rewarding better for your time put into game. Money hungry. Money hungry, money hungry.

This game might not look so good when you download it, but there is a lot you can do. Buy properties to get money, buy guns armor, cars. There are plenty of minigames and quick play missions like street races, survival, and parachuting. The storyline may only be decent, but the missions are still fun.  The only real problem is the file size. You have to dedicate too much of your storage, if you have a newer phone with more built in storage, or a microSD card, you should try this game.

The graphics are ok but I'm sure if they made this again in a Los Angeles version of some sort the graphics could get better and better!! Overall Amazing game and there's nobody else making games like this on the app store!! Great job! 10 out of 10 stars!!!

description: Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS‚àö Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.‚àö Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.‚àö Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN‚àö Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you‚Äôll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.‚àö Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.‚àö Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!‚àö Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.‚àö Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn‚Äôt the only way to make the big bucks!RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE‚àö Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.‚àö Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there‚Äôs no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!‚àö UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.‚àö CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL‚àö Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.THE STORY:In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano‚Äôs perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/GVonFacebookTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram:http://gmlft.co/GVonInstagramYouTube:http://gmlft.co/GVonYoutubeForum: http://gmlft.co/GV_ForumPrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-noticeTerms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-useEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula
descriptionHTML:
Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!
Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.

WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS
√ Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.
√ Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.
√ Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN
√ Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you’ll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.
√ Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.
√ Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!
√ Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.
√ Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn’t the only way to make the big bucks!

RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE
√ Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.
√ Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there’s no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!
√ UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.
√ CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.

BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL

√ Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.

THE STORY:
In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano’s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!
Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!

For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.

This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up.

The game is really interesting and entertaining. The graphics are smooth and and the controls are manageable.   The thing I disliked through my game play is that you don't get any clues what you have to do and/or how to defeat the new "enemies". While you understand what exactly you have to do, you've lost some lives. But that's not so important.  I will strongly recommend this game just because of its graphics, entertainment and due the fact, that this game is not pay-to-win game.

I really liked this game. The levels are very challenging and this game is addictive and fun. The only issue is that there are only 5 short lives  that when our lives ran out, we have to wait 18-19 minutes long to have 5 lives again. Of course, there are many hard levels in the game that keeps us dying and think a way to pass the level. So if possible, please shorten the time, like 5-7 minutes only and let us really enjoy the game. It's more even challenging and thrilling if there are many lives. And this game will be really perfect for us. Thank you.

Remember the old days when platformers taught you through trial and error how to interact with new game mechanics? If you don't like that, you'll hate this game. So much fun, so creative, and once you start to get down one of the new features, it ramps it up and keeps you learning creatively how to beat the level. I love this game, it's a fantastic platformer that will challenge you to learn as you go instead of giving you a tutorial every time something new comes up.

Completed all but just couldn't get enough of it. Everyone should play Redball 4. It is D best android games I've ever played. Those who complained about the Game play and control has an abnormal thumb. Easy, Fun & Challenging but nothing impossible to get through. I just hope they make new levels.

description: OVER 860 MILLION PLAYERS GLOBALLY!Race with the Minions in the award-winning, fan-favorite runner, Minion Rush!Run as fast as you can while jumping, dodging, rolling and knocking Minions off the track in despicably action-packed levels. Rush to collect Bananas and play exciting Special Missions to increase your score as you enjoy unexpected Minion moments.ALL THE FUN OF THE DESPICABLE ME MOVIES IN THE OFFICIAL GAME!‚Ä¢ Race as DAVE, CARL OR JERRY -- and straight out of the Despicable Me 3 movie, MEL!‚Ä¢ Wear incredibly UNIQUE COSTUMES, such as Lucy, the Surfer or the Ninja Minion.‚Ä¢ Speed through ICONIC LOCATIONS inspired by the Despicable Me movies, like Bratt's Lair, the Anti-Villain League and ancient Egyptian temples in The Pyramids.‚Ä¢ Power up your Minions by riding the FLUFFY UNICORN or GRU'S ROCKET.‚Ä¢ Play SPECIAL MISSIONS to discover new content and new Costumes in each update!______________________________________________You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, watching certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN. descriptionHTML:
OVER 860 MILLION PLAYERS GLOBALLY!

Race with the Minions in the award-winning, fan-favorite runner, Minion Rush!
Run as fast as you can while jumping, dodging, rolling and knocking Minions off the track in despicably action-packed levels.
Rush to collect Bananas and play exciting Special Missions to increase your score as you enjoy unexpected Minion moments.

ALL THE FUN OF THE DESPICABLE ME MOVIES IN THE OFFICIAL GAME!

• Race as DAVE, CARL OR JERRY -- and straight out of the Despicable Me 3 movie, MEL!
• Wear incredibly UNIQUE COSTUMES, such as Lucy, the Surfer or the Ninja Minion.
• Speed through ICONIC LOCATIONS inspired by the Despicable Me movies, like Bratt's Lair, the Anti-Villain League and ancient Egyptian temples in The Pyramids.
• Power up your Minions by riding the FLUFFY UNICORN or GRU'S ROCKET.
• Play SPECIAL MISSIONS to discover new content and new Costumes in each update!
______________________________________________

You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, watching certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.

descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
All aboard! Driving the colorful LEGO® DUPLO® Train from station to station is any toddler’s dream. Your child will play the role of the train driver, load cargo, build bridges, stop at crossings, help passengers, refuel, and lay new tracks to steer the train safely around obstacles.

Copying grown-ups and their activities is important to your 2-year-old toddler’s development - and few things are as ‘grown-up’ as driving a huge steam train through the scenic countryside, full speed ahead, horns tooting.

If your toddler is fascinated by trains, this simple game will provide new inspiration for hours of creative play - with or without a LEGO DUPLO train set.

Features:
*Bright, fun, and toddler-friendly animations and sound effects
*Intuitive icons and navigation for easy game play
*Cute, interactive DUPLO landscape with lots of building fun and surprises
*Based on the DUPLO My First Train set and familiar animals and characters
*No in-app purchases
*No third party advertising
*Parental gate to information about other LEGO DUPLO apps and products

About LEGO® DUPLO®
A preschool building toy specifically designed for children ages 1 ½ - 5 – small hands and big imaginations! Preschoolers can learn about shapes and colors hands-on. When the chewing-the-bricks phase fades out, the building experience phase takes over, helping to stimulate and improve fine motor skills development. (And yes, bricks-poured-onto-hard-surface noises stimulate other senses, too.)

BEST GAME FOR TODDLERS
This educational app for toddlers helps them develop their skills in a playful manner. We believe it is one of the best educational game for toddlers produced by LEGO which focuses on their development. This is also a great educational game for older kids because they can play with the LEGO® DUPLO Train.

EDUCATIONAL GAME FOR 2 YEAR OLD KIDS
This is the best first app for your kid. It was developed in order to teach digital skills, develop creativity through play and build motoric skills for your child. This is an educational app for 2 year old kids which will contribute to their development.

BEST FIRST GAME FOR KIDS
Is your kid just starting to play on digital devices? Are you looking for an app which will help him develop his mind and understanding of the surroundings? LEGO® DUPLO® Train is the best app for kids 2-4 years old.

CREATIVE GAMES FOR TODDLERS
This is a great creative app for toddlers which will help them develop their creativity. LEGO® DUPLO Train is one of the best role-play apps for toddlers in 2017 and allows your toddler to be the train conductor and drive the train through a kids safe environment.

DRIVE, BUILD AND HAVE FUN
Being able to have so many role-play possibilities, your toddler will be able to play the app in endless ways which will allow him to put his imagination into action.

FREE TODDLER GAMES
All the LEGO® DUPLO® apps are free to play and offer no in app purchases. This is one of the best free educational game for kids under 4 and it is an app your kid will enjoy. Visit the parents section in all the LEGO® DUPLO® apps for more information about the LEGO® DUPLO brand.

Visit LEGO.com/family for more build & play inspiration.
Visit LEGO.com/duplo/apps to find out more about other DUPLO apps.

For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.
Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

LEGO, the LEGO logo and DUPLO are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2016 The LEGO Group.

comments: I have loved Hot Wheels for years and this is a good game. Fun and challenging. However I have been a bit frustrated because sometimes I just explode for touching a wall like on level 6. Awesomeüòí Not to mention I sometimes just hit a ramp and don't reach the end and fall into a void. Also fix your Poppa Wheelie's handling. You killed it, literally. Just try and fix your game a bit and I will give a 5.

Horrendous abuse of in game ads like I've never seen before in an app. At some points, you literally cannot proceed until you open the play store. The game races are short balancing acts wherein you simply try to keep your car on its wheels. Do not download, and do not let your kids start playing.

Lost all in app purchases which amounts to stealing. Beware of doing in app purchases. Way to many ads. App also crashes a lot. Support said they would help then didn't respond after that. If my son was able to lose his progress and the money we sunk in the game because he was using multiple devices and didn't know what Cloud and Local meant which cause him to lose his progress then mabe this game shouldn't be labeled E for Everyone. Change the rating to Teen if they have to know what cloud means or risk losing there in app purchases.  Google change the rating on this game.

Good graphics. If you fail and do exact same again you may pass level if you level up car, you end up failing sooner and have to slow down but after trying 7 r 8 times gets annoying and the level up car is worse than your basic car. Too frustrating so deleting

The game is my little boys favourite but the recent batch of adverts in game (Yahoo specifically) don't close - meaning you have to force quit the game. Lazy programming and terrible QA process from the developers. Avoid.

Whoever decided to put the HW Poppa wheelie in the game is an idiot. Loved this game until i came across that car. Im seconds away from fully upgrading and moving on but i couldnt let it go. That car is a load of frustration.

description: In Asphalt 8, you‚Äôll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you‚Äôll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!‚Ä¢ Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.‚Ä¢ Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!‚Ä¢ Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.‚Ä¢ Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8‚Ä¢ Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!‚Ä¢ Perform barrel rolls & wild 360¬∫ jumps to soar past your opponents.‚Ä¢ Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS‚Ä¢ Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!‚Ä¢ Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that‚Äôs sure to keep you on your toes.‚Ä¢ Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!‚Ä¢ 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.‚Ä¢ Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.‚Ä¢ Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.‚Ä¢ Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!‚Ä¢ A detailed damage system.THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!‚Ä¢ Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!‚Ä¢ Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.‚Ä¢ Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals‚Äô ghost cars & bikes across the track.‚Ä¢ Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.‚Ä¢ Share your racing achievements & prove that you‚Äôre the ultimate speed machine.MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL‚Ä¢ A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION‚Ä¢ Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play. So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!__HOT WHEELS and associated trademarks and trade dress are owned by, and used under license from, Mattel. ¬©2017 Mattel. All Rights Reserved.__Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/A8_FacebookTwitter: http://gmlft.co/A8_TwitterInstagram: instagram.com/asphaltgamesYouTube: http://gmlft.co/A8_YouTubeForum: http://gmlft.co/A8_ForumThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeTerms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-useEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula

• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!
• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.
• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!

AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!
• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.
• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.
• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.
• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!
• A detailed damage system.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!
• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!
• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.
• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.
• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.
• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.

CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION
• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play.

So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!

comments: The amount of ads is ridiculous! Especially from that "Tune Blast", it's really annoying. And, w/some of the ads you have to wait 30sec before they're done, there's no "x" button. The actual mahjong game itself is decent.
Would be a great game to pass time if there werent an ad every 5 seconds. Seriously an ad when you click on options? Thats just greedy and stupid. Id give this less than a star if i could

Like the game BUT WAY TO MAMY ADS. No game needs this many ads, I can't do anything without an ad popping up. It is really getting on my last nerves, ecut down the amount I don't mind a few but not that many.
Overall, I love the game. The only thing wrong is that there's too many ads! I can't even go from menu to menu without an ad popping up. It's very irritating.

It would be better if there were more tile choices, besides the basic 3. What really annoys me is that if you pause for a few seconds to look up or think of a move, an ad pops up. A 30 second, non skipable ad. The ads are also there after you finish every match. I know you need to make revenue but jeez. Calm down.

I've always loved this gamed.  I wished I could be able before I die to learn how to play the way I see them playing in the movies, the correct way. Not the way we play on cell phones and tablets. I would just lost LUV to play with the tiles, to feel them in my hand etc

description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you‚Äôre not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You‚Äôll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTSüí∏PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!üí∏OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!üí∏RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!üí∏LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!üí∏GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!üí∏COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don‚Äôt miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder‚Äôs career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you‚Äôll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they‚Äôll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: Not completely sold on the game. Major problem: hoarfrost was not designed for touchscreen! Trying to clear the frost moves the screen, pulls down drop down menu from the top, pauses repeatedly, zooms & unzooms repeatedly...nightmare! Game has too much going on with collections, story, various games....to enjoy the game. I like the parts where I find stuff. The rest just gets in the way and bores me.

It's fun. It reminds me of another game I used to play, not sure if it based on that or by another company. I find the puzzles OK. Some are getting a bit difficult. I enjoy playing it but I get the feeling very soon I will have to spend some real pennies and when that happens I will probably stop playing.

Great combination of several puzzle genres thanks to the mini games between hidden object scenes. Easy learning curve and reasonable story line. It could do with some different music for scenes as the two tunes got repetitive quite fast. Music can be muted though

More complicated game mechanics than most hidden picture games, but the game walks you through them very well. Instead of a linear path, you are given the choice of several quests to choose from or you can ignore the quest and play any stage you have unlocked. Completing quests helps you learn more about the game world and its inhabitants. Very enjoyable with several mini games as well.

I love the game. I could play it all day only it wont let me! I absolutely Hate the bs energy scheme! Yah I could pay real money to buy play time but it would run out quick.  Its just a FB game. I want a hidden item I can play as long as I want.

I'm addicted to this game.  You don't have to spend money to enjoy it either.  Illustrated beautifully and I love the fact items move around plus also have different modes to keep you intrigued. I only find it frustrating not having enough energy to keep seeking

comments: Fastest uninstall ever. 15 seconds of gameplay, then 15 seconds of timed add. Can anyone spot the fake reviews? And when it comes to Movement just in General....my Main Problem, But NOT the Only Problem was the Movement in Exactness of where I'm Trying to Move my Guy (My/the Shooter) just Stinks!! - The Game itself....I Love It!!!

description: One Man. One War. Now You Are The Hot Sniper Killer.*There you play the game was the fantastic 3D FPS game .As the sole surviving special forces of a renegade attack against a ruthless terrorist organization, you are stranded on the battlefield and hell-bent on payback. descriptionHTML:
One Man. One War. Now You Are The Hot Sniper Killer.
*There you play the game was the fantastic 3D FPS game .As the sole surviving special forces of a renegade attack against a ruthless terrorist organization, you are stranded on the battlefield and hell-bent on payback.

You must use all of your specialized skills to survive the onslaught of the enemy forces and avenge your fallen soldiers.Faced with this situation of you have no choice but to grasp the nettle.From the M16 to AK47 and sniper guns, as you have access to a variety of light and heavy weapons, as well as powerful grenade too!In the battle you will be sent to different locations to perform the difficult task.Such as IceWorld,Desert,City.

Game Features:

**Fight in difficult terrain

You will face different environmental challenges spacing case.But nothing can stop you to destroy the enemy's confidence.

**Providing advanced weaponry

Many full power firearms will be available to give a fatal blow to terrorists for you.AK47,M16,WA2000,AWP,M400.

**Experience the perfect touch operation

The awesome 1rd person shooter with stunning console quality visuals, precise controls, advanced physics and destructibles. Jump in the heat of battle and push your Android device to the limit!

**Complete Dangerous Missions

The number of enemies and the AI you face are different depending on your selected tasks in each level.In short, the more the enemy killed, the more reward you get.

What are you waiting for, let's take a journey and start killing.
developerAddress: wanglei99999@gmail.com

description: It‚Äôs time for you to meet your favorite new puzzle game: Blend. Brought to you by Last Minute Games, Blend promises endless hyper-casual fun, with easy to learn gameplay, unlimited lives, no time limits, and eye-catching graphics - perfect for a moment of entertainment, or hours on end. Blend keeps it simple - your only goal is to merge blocks to increase their value. Place three blocks of the same value and color next to each other to merge them - vertically, horizontally, or both. You can rotate the pieces for optimal placement - make sure to place them for the most merging possible!When you merge a set of the highest value pieces, you‚Äôll clear a part of the board - make sure you keep merging to keep the board clear for new pieces. If you don‚Äôt leave enough room for your new blocks - that‚Äôs game over. Challenge your puzzling skills with Blend!
descriptionHTML:
It’s time for you to meet your favorite new puzzle game: Blend. Brought to you by Last Minute Games, Blend promises endless hyper-casual fun, with easy to learn gameplay, unlimited lives, no time limits, and eye-catching graphics - perfect for a moment of entertainment, or hours on end.

Blend keeps it simple - your only goal is to merge blocks to increase their value. Place three blocks of the same value and color next to each other to merge them - vertically, horizontally, or both. You can rotate the pieces for optimal placement - make sure to place them for the most merging possible!

When you merge a set of the highest value pieces, you’ll clear a part of the board - make sure you keep merging to keep the board clear for new pieces. If you don’t leave enough room for your new blocks - that’s game over.

Challenge your puzzling skills with Blend!

comments: A very fun and addictive game. I make bows all day, but it's nice to be able to shoot from my couch at night.  The influence of wind on the arrow is accurate when it comes to drift. A little costly on the upgrades for those that don't buy their way to the top, but all games are that way.

Starts off ok but completely rigged to deplete your coins and to get you to spend money. Bow repairs and inconsistent wind effects among a couple of tactics. Also payed to upgrade my bow and sights and it was gone next time I logged in.
Ok game, but bingo mode is a huge pain.  My shots filled out the opponent's card better than mine.  Stupid way to lose a lot of progress/coins.

I'm having issues with the speed/timed sessions.  Towards the end, the animation sequence will glitch, resulting in my opponent having time to get off an additional shot, while I'm attempting to reset and draw the bow.  Outside of that, it's an excellent game.

Game would be great if it didn't lag out after 6 games. I've lost more gold in rush due to the game's performance degrading than I can keep track of. Once it starts losing frame rate just quit or you will bleed gold.

Game was fine. Lately, keeps freezing and somehow opponents are getting 10's when I CLEARLY see them hitting nowhere near the middle. Matches are freezing while i'm ahead, then match ends and says I lost. Somehow i've lost 20 million coins, and not from legit losing either. I also just played a match for 1 million coins, i had over 1 million in the bank. I know sonehow have 0 after I clearly won the match but it said I lost. Either people are using cheats or the game is not functioning properly

comments: I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

This is #8 for Top Grossing Simulation and you can see in the game that they are trying everything they can to take the #1 spot.  During events they have a unique currency, if you spend real money on that currency and don't use it you're SOL. They don't compensate you by turning it into the next events currency.  Breeding and Hatching eggs takes enormous amounts of time be cause they want you to spend money to speed it up. (The rare the dragon the more tine it takes to breed and hatch, like 10-45hrs from what I've had).  Lastly only get 2 of 5 island, you have to SLOWLY save up crystal or pay real money to unlock them, islands fill up quick. You can youse the free gold but you better have a lot of Facebook friends playing as well or you can't unlock them

I feel that this is a fun and addictive game with lots of potential.. p However , please make quest battles in the arena longer , I was at the last battle but couldn't play it , because it's time was too short . 2 days is not alot, even if I play like 3 times or more a day.

It's a really good game, but just one problem:  there's that island that uses grid coins, and everytime Deus says " this island has a special currency:Grid coins" , it kicks me out of the game. Only when I go into that island and press 'ok' , it kicks me out. Please, Please, PLEASE fix it! I love playing dragon city and monster legends. :(

Like the game, but it keeps locking up an I lose my battles that I have won.  Also, some races and challenges are way too tight time wise.  It's a game, but when you make it impossible to get anywhere and we don't get credit for what we do it isn't any fun.

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

description: Introducing the Man of Steal‚Ä¶ Play as Bob, the hapless burglar intent on changing his ways. Unfortunately for Bob, however, he's going to be forced into a few final jobs before he's allowed out of the criminal life. ‚Ä¢ SUPER SNEAKY Sneak past security guards, residents and sleeping bulldogs as you recover the loot in each stage. Use your ninja-like skills to hide in some tight squeezes and avoid detection. ‚Ä¢ THERE GOES THE NEIGHBORHOOD Your sticky-fingered missions will take you through a local neighbourhood, Downtown, and even through some secret labs. Can you get a perfect on every one? ‚Ä¢ LOOT YOUR HEART OUT Bob is going to have to pinch everything from secret documents, to old pairs of clothes, to those always hard-to-find TV remotes! ‚Ä¢ CRIME IS A FUNNY OLD GAME Get engrossed in the comical storyline featuring hilarious animations, a fun script and a genuinely twisting narrative.
descriptionHTML:
Introducing the Man of Steal…
Play as Bob, the hapless burglar intent on changing his ways. Unfortunately for Bob, however, he's going to be forced into a few final jobs before he's allowed out of the criminal life.

• SUPER SNEAKY
Sneak past security guards, residents and sleeping bulldogs as you recover the loot in each stage. Use your ninja-like skills to hide in some tight squeezes and avoid detection.

• THERE GOES THE NEIGHBORHOOD
Your sticky-fingered missions will take you through a local neighbourhood, Downtown, and even through some secret labs. Can you get a perfect on every one?

• LOOT YOUR HEART OUT
Bob is going to have to pinch everything from secret documents, to old pairs of clothes, to those always hard-to-find TV remotes!

• CRIME IS A FUNNY OLD GAME
Get engrossed in the comical storyline featuring hilarious animations, a fun script and a genuinely twisting narrative.

comments: I'm really enjoying this game - it's surprisingly advanced for an app. Plays very smoothly and looks pretty. One annoying thing is I get network connection bugs from time to time flashing up. They don't stop me from playing tho, so meh. Also, the way they match players together is sometimes pretty suss, ships that wipe you out in two seconds flat...or less... just shouldn't be matched with you. But, overall pretty great.

One of the first games where there is a decent balance between paid and free gamers in gameplay. Amazing game. Just touched Level 50 and got rewarded an Aventador for free. Now to continue blowing up ships. Oh yeah great graphics too. A few more maps could help. Also you should be able to invite your friends. And I sold my super-heavy cannons but a fix would be appreciated.

Help! In game issue, I have a "superheavy cruise cannon" in my inventory and it looks as though my "Arbiter" ship has a special slot for that type of weapon but when I click the slot my cannon is not there! Instead it shows up when I click the slot for regular turrets, any help is appreciated. Username:RoyalStickman, amazing game will put rating back to 5star after

Was loving the game but now ships show that they're dead and yet they can still attack and he can't Target them. Fix this and I'll put it back in 5 stars. Also haven't been getting my daily log in or my league position award. Starting to think the developers don't care

Would be 5 stars except for 2 things. 1- Once you make a purchase there should be no pop up ads. Most apps do this don't be ridiculous. 2- High fail rate on improvements even at high percentage chances(failed twice on 90% and even worse at 80%) Maybe give half the money back on a fail its too expensive to absorb multiple failures

Fun game with potential. Controls are decent, targeting is buggy, graphics are good. Still some lag issues, even on strong wifi. Needs a little more balance added, with variations in range and role. Sooo many ads, but that's ok at times, because you can essentially farm premium currency to get mid-quality ships, but the paid-for ships and weps are obviously better in-game.
