comments: It's an amazing step for chess and for GMs taking the use of tech to the next level, I loved Play Magnus and really enjoyed this until I started getting to the more advanced 'riddles' in the intermediate level. The game doesn't allow for moves that give the same outcome, which is rather frustrating. Please fix!

Amazing concept  to learn chess in  right way.... Need some improvements.Facility to set up custom board and piece need to be included. Graphics,AI could be much better. Chess Opening explorer need to be added . Lessons with positional understanding in middle games need to be added. Hope you will make it better and better with every update.

Nice concept, very creatively done. My only real problem is the fact that I'd have to spend an amount of money that I just do not have to seriously take advantage of the app. I don't think many people are ready to spend ‚Ç¨139.99 on this, even if it's a great app.

Definitely  5 Stars App! Thank you so much for bringing it on Google Play Store. would recommend if the app would be available on Microsoft Store, and/or Google chrome. It will be great to follow our training on the Big screen.
Looks good, but i cant tap or move pieces at all, im stuck at the 1st session for my level(30) without being able to do anything

It's beautifully graphic and pleasing to the eyes! The puzzles could be a bit tougher and opening theory could be added!  Apart from that, it's very wonderful and an interactive way to learn and enjoy chess. Person of any age can enjoy this app!
description: A better, more fun way to learn and train chess! Master chess through engaging games and interactive lessons with Magnus Carlsen, the World Chess Champion!UNIQUE TRAINING BY CHESS EXPERTSPlay unique, beautiful games crafted by chess experts and game design experts. Deepen your chess skills through premium lessons based on games by Magnus Carlsen and other world-leading chess players. All games and lessons are created by Magnus Carlsen and his team of experienced Grand Masters, all of whom have years of coaching experience.Magnus Trainer makes learning chess easy and engaging for players of all levels. New games are updated and added regularly to bring you the best possible experience, and we're adding new theory lessons every week.Each mini-game has dozens of levels, ranging from beginner to advanced, allowing all chess players, new and experienced, to find a challenging fit to improve their skills. Those who have never played chess before are able to learn the fundamentals in a series of introductory lessons, while more experienced players have access to advanced tactics and strategies, covering a range of end-game essentials.FROM AN AWARD WINNING TEAM  The Magnus Trainer app has been featured in Fast Company, The Guardian, and VG, and is the creation of the team behind the Play Magnus app, winner of several design awards.‚ÄúI‚Äôve always done things a little differently. That is what inspired me to create Magnus Trainer. Chess has always been fun, but this takes learning and training chess to a new level. Magnus Trainer is chess training for everyone!‚Äù‚Äî Magnus Carlsen‚ÄúThe Future of Chess!‚Äù ‚Äî Rob, App Store Reviewer You can also check out our other free app, Play Magnus. Play against Magnus at any age from 5 years and up!FEATURES- Multiple unique, beginner-friendly mini-games, with dozens of levels in each. - Unique and innovative game design ensures essential chess skills are developed in a fun and effective way.- Caters to beginners and advanced players alike. - Learn chess from the greatest player of all time!REACH FURTHER WITH A MEMBERSHIPThe app is free to use, with added benefits for paying members. Members enjoy instant access to all 150+ premium lessons, many exclusive only for members. As a member, you also get infinite lives so you can always keep playing, including exclusive bonus levels. For Magnus Trainer we offer the following subscriptions:- 1 month- 12 months- LifetimeTERMS OF PAYMENTPayment will be charged to your Google Play account after you‚Äôve confirmed a purchase. Subscription to a membership automatically renews, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the price for renewal will be provided. You can change your subscription settings in Subscriptions in Google Play, or in the More tab in Magnus Trainer when a subscription is active. It is not possible to cancel an active subscription to get a refund of remaining time. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. For more information:Terms of Use - http://www.playmagnus.com/termsPrivacy Policy - http://www.playmagnus.com/privacy www.playmagnus.com

Play unique, beautiful games crafted by chess experts and game design experts. Deepen your chess skills through premium lessons based on games by Magnus Carlsen and other world-leading chess players. All games and lessons are created by Magnus Carlsen and his team of experienced Grand Masters, all of whom have years of coaching experience.

Magnus Trainer makes learning chess easy and engaging for players of all levels. New games are updated and added regularly to bring you the best possible experience, and we're adding new theory lessons every week.

Each mini-game has dozens of levels, ranging from beginner to advanced, allowing all chess players, new and experienced, to find a challenging fit to improve their skills. Those who have never played chess before are able to learn the fundamentals in a series of introductory lessons, while more experienced players have access to advanced tactics and strategies, covering a range of end-game essentials.


FROM AN AWARD WINNING TEAM

The Magnus Trainer app has been featured in Fast Company, The Guardian, and VG, and is the creation of the team behind the Play Magnus app, winner of several design awards.

“I’ve always done things a little differently. That is what inspired me to create Magnus Trainer. Chess has always been fun, but this takes learning and training chess to a new level. Magnus Trainer is chess training for everyone!”
— Magnus Carlsen

“The Future of Chess!”
— Rob, App Store Reviewer

You can also check out our other free app, Play Magnus. Play against Magnus at any age from 5 years and up!


FEATURES

- Multiple unique, beginner-friendly mini-games, with dozens of levels in each.
- Unique and innovative game design ensures essential chess skills are developed in a fun and effective way.
- Caters to beginners and advanced players alike.
- Learn chess from the greatest player of all time!


REACH FURTHER WITH A MEMBERSHIP

The app is free to use, with added benefits for paying members.

Members enjoy instant access to all 150+ premium lessons, many exclusive only for members. As a member, you also get infinite lives so you can always keep playing, including exclusive bonus levels.

For Magnus Trainer we offer the following subscriptions:
- 1 month
- 12 months
- Lifetime


TERMS OF PAYMENT

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account after you’ve confirmed a purchase. Subscription to a membership automatically renews, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the price for renewal will be provided. You can change your subscription settings in Subscriptions in Google Play, or in the More tab in Magnus Trainer when a subscription is active.

It is not possible to cancel an active subscription to get a refund of remaining time.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

For more information:

Privacy Policy - http://www.playmagnus.com/privacy

description: The ColorPix is an antistress coloring by numbers for adults and children. The ColorPix is the free coloring book. You shouldn't pay for anything! ColorPix has an antistress and relaxing effect. If you don‚Äôt have any skills in painting you can try coloring by numbers. The coloring book by numbers is the easiest way to create a beautiful image on your own hands!Coloring by numbers is quite simple even for small kids. We choose a lot of pretty images in pixel art which can be liked by children e.g. kids can color a unicorn or any animals.There are a lot of easy images for kids. Also, many pixel images for adults are available too. For example, you can color a unicorn or an astronaut.We have added a unique feature! Now you can color your photos! descriptionHTML:
The ColorPix is an antistress coloring by numbers for adults and children. The ColorPix is the free coloring book. You shouldn't pay for anything!

ColorPix has an antistress and relaxing effect. If you don’t have any skills in painting you can try coloring by numbers. The coloring book by numbers is the easiest way to create a beautiful image on your own hands!

Coloring by numbers is quite simple even for small kids. We choose a lot of pretty images in pixel art which can be liked by children e.g. kids can color a unicorn or any animals.
There are a lot of easy images for kids. Also, many pixel images for adults are available too. For example, you can color a unicorn or an astronaut.
We have added a unique feature! Now you can color your photos! Just take the photo, ColorPix will transform your photo to the pixel coloring page! So you could get your pixel portrait for example! Also, you could see a video how you've colored pages.
Please, rate our coloring app ColorPix! It’s very important for us because your reviews highly motivate us to improve the coloring pages 2018!

descriptionHTML:
Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!

There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!

Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. Take care of baby tiger Lili while she is taking a bath. Shop for stylish clothes and accessories for all animal friends, and feel free to ask cute fluffy hotel staff for help!

Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel fun little games for kids:
· Style and decorate Reception to your own taste!
· Help little puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room!
· Unpack Fifi’s clothes and design her travel bag!
· Dry and comb Kiki’s beautiful hair and do her makeup!
· Help tiger Cara to take care of her baby Lili: bath her and style her hair!
· Feed Fifi yummy lunch at the Café!
· Dress up Kiki, Fifi, Cara and Lili in the most amazing outfits at the Fashion Shop!
· Call Reception if you have troubles – cute bunnies are ready to help you!
· Play Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel game every day and collect rewards!
· Watch videos and get extra coins for new game items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to join Swampy, Allie, and Cranky on their NEXT exciting adventure!

The sequel to the most addicting physics-based puzzler from Disney has finally arrived. Where’s My Water? 2 launches with three brand new locations including the Sewer, the Soap Factory, the Beach. Best of all, the puzzles are all free! Cut through dirt, and guide fresh water, purple water, and steam to help Swampy and his friends!

Key Features:
• Play 100+ levels and challenges with a brand new look in the Gator universe featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky, and Mystery Duck!
• Introducing ‘Challenge Modes’ to replay the levels in explosive new ways!
• Dig as fast as you can and get as many duckies as possible in ‘Duck Rush’ levels!
• ‘Tri-ducking’ is now faster, better and more fun with boosts, such as Vacuum, Dropper, and Absorber! Small fees may be required for these additional boosts.
• Connect through Facebook and see if you can beat your pals on the adventure!
• Experience fun mechanics that are uniquely designed for each character!
• Complete achievements and earn special themed duckies such as gladiator-duckie, astronaut-duckie, hula-duckie, and many more!
• Stuck on a level? Use hints to help you solve the puzzles!

Where’s My Water? is a multiple Game of the Year award-winning puzzle game. The Where's My... franchise has received hundreds of millions of downloads to date. Check out Where’s My Mickey? and Where's My Perry? for more refreshing water-physics fun!

Visit Facebook.com/DisneyMobileGames for cool game tips, news and more!

Before you download this app, please consider that this app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within our applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device’s advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).

• In-app purchases that cost real money
• The option to accept push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content
• Location-based services
• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards
• As well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies

This app accesses your contact information to enable you to easily
communicate with your contacts.

You can upload and save content from this app to your device.

Visit the official Where's My Water? 2 website – http://games.disney.com/wheres-my-water-2-app

Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com
Children’s Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/
Terms of Use - https://disneytermsofuse.com

For additional information about our practices in the United States and Latin America regarding children’s personal information, please read our Children’s Privacy Policy at https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/

Burbank, CA 91521-0105

descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and fun farming simulation game. Raise cute farm animals and harvest diverse crops to make your farm a success! It's up to you to make your dream farm by the seaside. Start building your dream farm now.

■■ Game Features ■■
✓ Played by over 60 million people all around the world!
✓ Tired of upgrading the Barn? Enjoy unlimited Barn space.
✓ Prepare more than 400+ dishes in the kitchen.
✓ Plant, harvest and produce over 200+ unique products!
✓ Compete with other farmers in the new Farm Beauty Contest!
✓ Daily orders and new missions added regularly for more fun!
✓ 500+ unique, cute, and well-designed decorations!
✓ Adopt pets and costume them with pet apparel and equipment. Now you can breed pets to make new baby pets!
✓ Exotic Island Farm: Explore a Mine, Garden!
✓ Marine Sea Resort: You are now the owner of the Sea Resort! Complete resort orders and build the best resort for visitors to come to!
✓ Visit neighbors' farms and sample their newest dishes to earn prizes, help clean decorations, and trade for needed farm products!

Family Farm Seaside supports 21 languages including; English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian Bokmål, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

※ Product Usage Details
- Recommended Specifications: CPU Quad core 2.3GHz, Ram 2GB
- Minimum Specifications: CPU Quad core 1.5GHz, Ram 1GB

※ Access permission notice for gameplay
STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ App Notes
- This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.
- Family Farm Seaside is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game can be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

※ Contact Us!
- Family Farm Seaside Custmer Support: https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/family-farm-seaside/
- Need more neighbors and want to get game news and tips? »»» Like 👍 our official Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/familyfarmseaside
- Privacy Policy: http://www.funplusgame.com/privacy_policy/
developerAddress: PO Box309, Ugland House, Grand Cayman, KY1-1104 Cayman Islands

comments: Whenever I try to open the app the screen starts flashing black and it'll stay like that or keeping turning back to the screen I was on and off, which ends up somewhat strobe-like. The actual game itself is amazing despite having a hard time trying to beat the bacteria level but, what's the point of a good game concept, if the game won't work properly

I thought the new scenario was a free-trial only like the simian flu. (At least you can unlock it after being a brutal pro at the game) I'm gonna enjoy playing this a good few times and unlock even MORE scenarios. Keep up the good work! I wanted to make a suggestion, but I just can't remember now. Oh well...

Fun game. I wish the rate of death was more consistent. 37,000,000 a day at one point, but waiting 6 months for 100,000 to die towards the end. The disease didn't change, the rate of death shouldn't decrease just because there are fewer people. Good game otherwise

Quite an enjoyable game and different to games I normally play.  It is a strategy game were you have to try and create a deadly virus and wipe out the world, before the scientists find a cure.  What makes this game different is that instead of trying to save the human race, you try to destroy it.   Just a good job it isn't real.
Just another pathetic buy to play hidden behind a few ftp aspects. After about five or six wins your not allowed to even watch videos anymore to add your unlocks from winning to your disease

Really annoying ads keep repeating and covering controls.  So annoying. Pity as game is unplayable like this. It never used to happen before. Why can't developer just charge for extra content rather than make game unplayable. Will have to remove.

descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

descriptionHTML:
That's You! is the companion app you need to play the hilarious That’s You! game for the PlayStation®4 system. Please note: This app acts as a controller. PlayStation®4 system, That’s You! game, and That’s You! Companion App required to play. PS4™ system and That’s You! game for the PS4 system sold separately.


Find out what you and your friends really think about each other in the party game where the questions are all about… YOU!

Make sure your PlayStation®4 system is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Swipe, type, snap and draw your answers for the PS4 game
• Take pictures of yourself and your friends, then doodle on them to answer
• Create your own word and picture questions to play on PS4
• Play ‘Pass It On’ using just the app, to get a taste of the full PS4 experience
• Share your pictures and questions on social media!

The application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Brazilian Portuguese and Mexican Spanish

PlayLink titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controllers. http://playstation.com/playlinkforps4

Please note: This app acts as a controller. PlayStation®4 system, That’s You! game, and That’s You! Companion App required to play. PS4™ system and That’s You! game for the PS4 system sold separately.

description: Come and be a part of the gaming revolution that SALT is. Play something new every day. If you love challenges, adventures, and games, you are at the best place you could possibly be. We promise to take you on an unending adventure with new challenges, new stories, and a brand new game every day.In life, you encounter a lot of problems. Problems with studies, problems with exams, problems with relationships, problems of finance and what not. And just when you think you have a solution to a particular problem, Life throws at you a brand new problem.Well, solving problems of life isn't much fun but cracking games can be. And you know it. Especially when it comes to challenging your friends and beating them at it. Ever imagined yourself living a different life every single day. One day you are a politician, on another day you are a doctor, on some other day you are a businessman, one day you are an engineer. Okay! Let's leave the engineers out of it. Sorry once again! Wouldn't the surprise element in the aforementioned cases be amazing?Wouldn't you just look forward to waking up from your bed every single day to try to find out what awaits you today?Wouldn't the excitement levels be extremely high if there was something like this?Well, there is!SALT brings to you a wide variety of games. In fact, the game changes every day. Yes! Every single day. On Monday, you are figuring out a way to help Mr. Stick escape the murderous Pie Man. On Tuesday, you are defending your planet against the invasion of aliens. On Wednesday, you have to navigate through laser walls to save your life. You might need to kill everything that comes in the way. #JustSayingOn Thursday, you need to help the squares reclaim their rights in the autocratic world of rectangles. On Friday, you suddenly find yourself in a pond of fishes and as some old Mr Darwin said, ‚ÄúOnly the fittest survive‚Äù, you need to feed yourself and avoid everything else in the fish-eat-fish world.On Saturday, you have to figure out a strategy to build bridges between squares and rectangles to make this world a peaceful place.On Sunday. Yes, we know it's a Sunday! You are required to just chill and drive your way through small obstacles to your destinations.And the best part is that the surprise element is the only constant that you will get here. No Sunday will ever be the same again. And no Monday will be as dull(?) as it was the previous week. Join us on this journey of SALT where just like life we offer you a brand new set of challenges and maybe wars every single day, albeit in a much simpler way. Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. On top of that, you will have only 24 hours to stake a claim for becoming the 'Best'. Challenge your buddies, set new high scores and brag about it. (That's what high scores are for!) Make your games more interesting, accept new challenges and most importantly as our beloved MS Dhoni puts it -- "Enjoy The Game"!And as a sie man once put it."The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance."Come join the SALT adventure.
descriptionHTML:
Come and be a part of the gaming revolution that SALT is. Play something new every day.
If you love challenges, adventures, and games, you are at the best place you could possibly be. We promise to take you on an unending adventure with new challenges, new stories, and a brand new game every day.

In life, you encounter a lot of problems. Problems with studies, problems with exams, problems with relationships, problems of finance and what not. And just when you think you have a solution to a particular problem, Life throws at you a brand new problem.
Well, solving problems of life isn't much fun but cracking games can be. And you know it. Especially when it comes to challenging your friends and beating them at it.

Ever imagined yourself living a different life every single day. One day you are a politician, on another day you are a doctor, on some other day you are a businessman, one day you are an engineer. Okay! Let's leave the engineers out of it. Sorry once again!

Wouldn't the surprise element in the aforementioned cases be amazing?
Wouldn't you just look forward to waking up from your bed every single day to try to find out what awaits you today?
Wouldn't the excitement levels be extremely high if there was something like this?
Well, there is!

SALT brings to you a wide variety of games. In fact, the game changes every day. Yes! Every single day.

On Monday, you are figuring out a way to help Mr. Stick escape the murderous Pie Man.
On Tuesday, you are defending your planet against the invasion of aliens.
On Wednesday, you have to navigate through laser walls to save your life. You might need to kill everything that comes in the way. #JustSaying
On Thursday, you need to help the squares reclaim their rights in the autocratic world of rectangles.
On Friday, you suddenly find yourself in a pond of fishes and as some old Mr Darwin said, “Only the fittest survive”, you need to feed yourself and avoid everything else in the fish-eat-fish world.
On Saturday, you have to figure out a strategy to build bridges between squares and rectangles to make this world a peaceful place.
On Sunday. Yes, we know it's a Sunday! You are required to just chill and drive your way through small obstacles to your destinations.
And the best part is that the surprise element is the only constant that you will get here. No Sunday will ever be the same again. And no Monday will be as dull(?) as it was the previous week.

Join us on this journey of SALT where just like life we offer you a brand new set of challenges and maybe wars every single day, albeit in a much simpler way.
Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. On top of that, you will have only 24 hours to stake a claim for becoming the 'Best'. Challenge your buddies, set new high scores and brag about it. (That's what high scores are for!)

Make your games more interesting, accept new challenges and most importantly as our beloved MS Dhoni puts it -- "Enjoy The Game"!

And as a sie man once put it.
"The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance."
Come join the SALT adventure.
summary: Take a plunge into a new beginning every 24 hours & play something new every day
title: SALT - Play Something New Everyday

This game is great! There are a lot of things to unlock via treasure chests. Although, a few more animals to hunt would be nice. The graphics are much better than other Online Animal sims; and, the way the animals move is much more fluid. The new update improved many things! I especially like the new legendary skins and actions. I'm also glad that the family can do actions, too. I'm now awaiting for new maps and new animals! Maybe a Mountain Lion or a Wolverine as a new playable character? A cool map idea would be a desert or a farm/ranch. I think this game should only have predatory animals as playable characters. You should make a separate game featuring prey animals for the people who want to play that sort of game instead of adding them to Wildcraft. If you are looking for a COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY game similar to WolfQuest, get Wildcraft!

comments: Most puzzles are self explanatory. The odd few appeared to be impossible without some instruction. Few levels I had to skip probably around 7 levels. Couple due to pieces not moving or stuck. Very happy to be able to skip levels.  Would have been great to have a certain bank of hints for some of the  difficult ones. I found the later levels easier than the ones around 100. Max levels 120. Great fun!

Some things are hidden in such a place makes it hard on note 8 due to curved screen. Level 89 doesn't work, as well as other levels where touching the same place over and over and over might get something to work.  Most puzzles are extremely easy,  it's just a matter of the game not working.

Maybe it's just my phone, Galaxy S7, but even when i knew what to do i had to tap over and over again to get a response. Seriously, tap the object 10 times and nothing happens then tap it an eleventh time and it reacts. Very frustrating. Spent most of my time just repeatedly tapping the object. Game is a good concept, but really bad controls.
Fun and challenging for awhile, but I found most of the levels after 50 impossible to figure out without a cheat sheet. Got frustrating. I'm at level 60 and about ready to throw in the towel.

Some levels are straight forward. Others you just have to skip because there's no logic or something is missing. Could be good with some type of help if you get stuck rather than just skipping an entire level.

Not responsive to most touches. I finally got a cheat only to realize it was the game.  Ads were not frequent but had a strobe light going off (health issues) and would not turn off. Had to close out of the game every time so I just quit playing. Typo many similar more challenging games out there to try and work with this one.

comments: I AM OBSESSED!!! This game is awesome, I love shooting things that deserve to be shot!!! The only problem is that you need to be a certain level to buy something and how there's only boots and helmets, and no chest plates or leggings, but when I first played it I was shocked to find 2 problems in an amazing app! 5 stars everything! Also, you should make huge, amazing looking, almost impossible bosses that will make me flip my table when I can't beat them! Keep making more awesome games!

Loved this game!!! It is my new favorite game I love all the powerful weapons and armor. I wish there was chestplates instead of amulets and leggings instead of bracelets and an easier way to find out what your hero level, But else then that it was perfect. I loved how you can choose the controls to your own preference. Chame on anyone who gave it a less then 5 Star review. I still dont know ho to tell what your hero level was but still my favorite game.

I'm really loving this game it's simple but still a ton of fun. My one complaint would be the sometimes the grind is too long and I almost gave up... I wish the developers would throw in some kind of experience boost in the store instead of just being able to buy coins. I would pay real money for an exp boost and would love to support the Developers! just give me the chance!

This game would be perfect if the controls were better. They are nonsense. Doesn't always shoot when I tap, jumping is crazy, and the game gives you multiple ways to control, but they are all garbage. Also would have appreciated a tutorial so I knew what I was doing

I really like the game. But there's one thing that annoys me: when I don't play this game for a few hours and then I do another battle in dungeon, the game crashes after killing last monster in that battle.  I found out that if I switch on mobile data it works. So I wanted to asked why is that. EDIT: now all works just fine. 5 stars

Love the game. Some feedback - it would be nice if you could choose a wave to start from in Hell. It takes about an hour to get to wave 300. More xp levels and perks and abilities. currently capped at 175. Crafting? Ability to make your own gear with random abilities and rare level. And, the map is boring. Cryo grenade is awful, doesn't freeze bosses, and the standard grenade takes off HALF the specified damage. Meant to take off 750, damages for 375.

comments: The art style is amazing. The Zen mode and overall atmosphere is relaxing and entertaining. My big issue is after resetting my progress once I completed everything. You loose the coin doubling upgrade that you pay real money for. Why must I re purchase some I have already bought. Why does resetting my progress reset something I purchased with real money. I feel that is a little unfair and even from a premium purchaser is pretty jading, I really enjoy the game and will change to a 5 star once an answer is provided or it is fixed.

I remember back when this game would cost money on iOS. I would literally try to download every single third party helper app just to look for this game. Now that i actually have a phone, its free. I think this game is great for both relaxing and competitive play. And I am so hyped for the Odyssey. I check often to see if it is there. 10/10 would recommend this game.

The thing that makes this game great is the visuals and the audio. It is absulutley beautiful and the art style works so well with the type of game. Without this the game would not be nearly as good as the game play I'd very simple but it would still do ok. However these features are what makes the game. Also the fact that there's a night and day feature gives the game an even bigger opportunity to show the beauty of its art style

Alright, so the game is pretty good. All I ask for is more tricks, and the ability to upgrade some bonuses (coin magnet, feather hover thing, and the third one that I haven't grabbed yet.) All in all, if you could do that, it'd make the game so much greater. Apart from skipping missions and revives there's no use for coins.

Its a simple game with very simple things but still is exciting to play. If you are looking for a little mental relaxation or peace and still be able to enjoy the adventure, then this is a perfect thing. There are things I would love to improve. For instance the landing - and background music should have a variety. Also the zen mode is a cool little bonus but the music volume should be greater than other sounds. Hope to see these improvements..

Good graphics, but can get boring after only like 3 minutes. Also the makers of the game should add a another different mode where your running away from a villager/camper and see how far you can get. You could improve or modify this mode that i have made if you want
description: Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders ‚Äì all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.Features:‚Ä¢ Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay‚Ä¢ Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding‚Ä¢ Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more‚Ä¢ Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system‚Ä¢ Chain together combos to maximize points and speed‚Ä¢ Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals‚Ä¢ Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities‚Ä¢ Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!‚Ä¢ Acquire the wingsuit from Izel‚Äôs workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic‚Ä¢ Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design‚Ä¢ Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)Reviews:"A piece of interactive art"‚Äì WIRED"One of the best mobile games"‚Äì The Verge"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"‚Äì IGN"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"‚Äì TIME
descriptionHTML:
Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.

Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.

Features:

• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay

• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding

• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more

• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system

• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed

• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals

• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities

• Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!

• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic

• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design

• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)

Reviews:

"A piece of interactive art"
– WIRED

"One of the best mobile games"
– The Verge

"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"
– IGN

"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"
– TIME

title: Alto's Adventure

comments: Absolutely nothing to do after completing campaign mode because all the events after RQ100 are pvp based and with a RQ150 limit while you are only around RQ110 - 115 when you complete campaign.  Even if you paid a lot of real cash to roll for good S class cars it does not mean you could go further after the relatively short campaign mode.  The game is so dead after you 100% the campaign and there will hardly be any reward for you to make way to RQ125 + in order to be competitive in those pvp events again.  This game probably just last 2 weeks tbh.  Great hope and great let down.

Couple if things wrong with it. 1. If you 3* an event, when collecting your 3 rewards it sometimes kicks you out ofter collecting only 1 or 2. 2. And this has really naffed me off. I've taken part in 2 events today and was in 1st place. I've logged back in and it says i'm unranked as if i haven't taken part - glitch or hack from another player?!?!?

I think this game is amazing! And is perfectly good in every way!! I can't stop playing and look forward to getting new cars. There is just one tiny error that bugs me a bit but I can cope with it. The error is the color of the Ford fiesta xr2. When you race someone else and they have this vehicle on the card the car is black with a tiny red trim on the side but when it's on the track it is completely red. I do hope you can will fix this small mistake but apart from that this game is great!!! Thanks for reading :)

Definitely a game for car buffs. It requires using your "mind" to win. I'm not to sure about my rating yet. But, will definitely change if needed. It's unlike any game I've played & I like it! Someone wrote a review that this is a lazy person's game... LMA√ò, I wish they would show me the games they play while they are running, swimming & mountain climbing "while" they play, smh HAHA!

I love the concept and it's been great to see how far this game has come, but I've been playing since beta and nearly every update wipes my save data and forces me to restart. Luckily, I don't get too far into the game each time, but it is frustrating and enough of a buzz kill for me to drop two stars. If there was a cloud system implemented for saves this game would be a five star in my book

Update 2/22/18: Pay to win alert: The developers don't care/wont help. I've literally been trying for 5 months now to beat the final boss and i still cant win. This game is not worth your time if you're looking for a "fun" for everyone game. Its a pay to win lie of a game. I loved this game but sadly i give up. WAY too frustrating. Don't bother asking the developer for help. They'll just make an update that makes it even more frustrating to beat.

descriptionHTML:
Think you know your cars? It’s time to put your knowledge to the test in Top Drives - the #1 FREE car racing card collection game on mobile.
BUILD THE PERFECT CAR RACING DECK from over 700 officially licensed cars.
UNLEASH YOUR CARS on 100s of racing challenges with our all-new Card Racing System.
COMPETE FOR EXCLUSIVE CARS in live multiplayer events against rivals.

Why is Top Drives the ultimate motorsport experience for every car enthusiast?
- Marques such as McLaren, Bugatti, Pagani, Porsche, Mercedes and many more.
- Real Car stats sourced from Evo Magazine making this the ultimate bench racing tool.
- Manage, upgrade and tune your cars – be the best motorsport manager.
- Race scenarios include drag strips, race circuits & hill climbs.
- Weather effects and multiple surface types, including dirt, asphalt, and snow.
- Stunning car photography from one of the world’s top car magazines.
- Addictive and fun racing strategy gameplay.

Top Drives is free to play but offers some optional in-game items that can be purchased for real money. Top Drives is an online game and requires a persistent internet connection to play.

comments: Had found a phone on the job sight and played the sample version. I HAD to download it as soon as I got access to my own shine. I play constantly!  Haven't gotten very far yet. See for yourself just how additive & F-U-N it is!!! üòâüíØ

The Game is good. Some things to improve it:  save your profile using your Google Account. Play with Friends in Tournaments (ie. Teams, Challenges), ability to givie Hearts to friends without using Facebook Also can you PLEASE improve the notification! My friend sends me Requests to Bowl & most of the time I don't get notified. Thank U

Not sure how the currency works or how to upgrade my levels. Played 10 times and still can't upgrade the ball. Do they expect real cash to upgrade 1 ball? Also the controls are touchy, I've inadvertently chucked a few balls into the gutter while trying to align it before my release. Some tutorials would be nice.

Not to bad of game play. Does have minor bugs such as the 1 v  1 quickfire games; where pins downed before time is up near the end of players not counted.  I would avoid that section of the game.  The ads are often annoying popping up between games.  The ads are often difficult to figure out how to close or stop.

I did like this fame but my lane keeps turning pink along with the ball so I can't actually see anything like where the ball is going.... and on quick fire again turns everything pink and don't let me take any shoots what do ever.. think it's a glitch in the game I'm not sure but tried restarting the game and the same thing is happening again and again... on all the different lanes and extra games in bowling king...

Quick fire is the best but theres only one down fall, the seconds. When you get to the last seconds it doesnt give you your last strike and the other person wins.they should fix that.you have to score right on the 2 second count b4 you get ur last strike. Please fix it so peoples last strike can count, thank you, other than that its a great and awesome game to play to challenge your players. üëçüëçüåüüåüüåüüåüüåüüåüüåüüåüüåüüåüüåü...also the developer should add macau lanes, London lanes and pins..

comments: Would have rated a 5, but I think the cost to continue a level ($300 and up) is disproportionate to the $$ awarded when you beat a level (< $50).  Exceptional storyline and graphics!  Cute animals and decorations. Love that I have several choices on some items. I hope new animals and habitats are available soon!

To all those who are complaining about tough levels and too many levels, I say this is a great design. For almost all levels, so far, I found there is a subtle trick that makes it easy to solve. Also since I completed all levels I really can't agree to the "impossible part". This is a great game design with sub plots. But please let us have the new levels soon.
Ridiculous levels get to a point you can not beat the level even to spend money impossible.   Relaxing game to pass time turns into another delete like every game here.  Pathetic
It is quite a good game but it takes too long to win enough tickets or rocka to do anything at the zoo. Then it becomes frustrating. I refuse to spend money to get extra points.

I thought this game was fun UNTIL it said you had to WAIT FOR MORE QUESTS!  This happened after each completion of an enclosure...very frustrating!  Have been waiting two days, so far, for a new enclosure quest:(  Not very professional!

This game is ridiculous.   Have to do games to get things and then when you open up to get animals youbthen have to play multiple games to get items to expand or play or train.  Way too much and only get 5 lives for all the different games you are forced to play.

descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo
✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters

comments: I like the app in all, but I have some points I would like the developer to take into consideration. When a new game starts, it would be better to start with the "mine" option on and not the flag (so that you can open a new tile and not set a flag randomly), even if the flag was the last option used in the previous round. I also believe that in hard mode the game is made too random and not that skill-demanding. Other than these points it's nicely done!

I love that this game has been ported so smoothly to the phone. The most interesting part of this game is the ads, or rather, the option of ads. In since this game is free it includes ads, but you can turn them of, or change the kind of ad that you get. For this reason, i actually had the ads on, because i think the developer deserves the money he/she gets from choosing such a great system. Sadly i cannot speak for everyone. Good game.

Overall the app is really great. It's the same concept as the original PC version with just some slight changes to make it work for a touch screen. The only downside is that since you're not playing with a mouse you have to click a button at the top of the screen every time you want to switch between planting flags or revealing spaces vs using the right or left mouse buttons. But I see no way around this on a smart phone or tablet. Also, there are very minimal ads, which is awesome.

Pretty good, would like a little better graphics though, and sometimes when I go to hold it registers as a tap. Maybe it's just my phone. Also I'm not sure how close it is to the PC version (scale and such) and would like it closer. But I know its hard on a phone screen. Maybe if you made the rotation horizon, you can match the PC layout more (with the different sized boards that the PC version has)

Input delays keep getting me killed. Instead of marking a bomb my input sets it off. I'd prefer two different inputs for marking or removing tiles.  I'm using a stylus too so I know it's not an issue of accidentally hitting the wrong tile.

Good game, same as old time windows PC. One suggestion: please show the advertisement only if 15 seconds or more gameplay is complete. Because I always click randomly at different squares initially untill the game builds up, and due to this, if a mine explodes, then I always accidently click on the ads that are displayed at game over screen.

description: In Photo Roulette you compete with your friends to quickly guess whose photo is shown. Play with random photos from you and your friends' phones in this social and exciting Photo Roulette game! Feel the thrill before each picture and share the hilarious moments that occur with the pictures of your friends and family!In Photo Roulette, you and your friends team up and engage in a highly social game on your phones. In each round of Photo Roulette a random photo is chosen from one players‚Äô photo library and briefly showed to all of the players. The players compete in quickly guessing whose photo it is, receiving a score based on time and accuracy of their answer. After 10 pictures, the Photo Roulette champion is crowned!Photo Roulette features:-	3-10 players in a competitive and easy-to-learn game-	Super fun and social PARTY GAME for all ages-	Get to know your friends and family through their photos-	Relive amazing moments with photos you had forgotten-	Highscore list after each round and game endThe photos are only displayed for 5 seconds, so your friends and family will only see them briefly. Feel the thrill before each picture and share the hilarious moments that occur with the pictures of your friends and family!
descriptionHTML:
In Photo Roulette you compete with your friends to quickly guess whose photo is shown. Play with random photos from you and your friends' phones in this social and exciting Photo Roulette game! Feel the thrill before each picture and share the hilarious moments that occur with the pictures of your friends and family!

In Photo Roulette, you and your friends team up and engage in a highly social game on your phones. In each round of Photo Roulette a random photo is chosen from one players’ photo library and briefly showed to all of the players. The players compete in quickly guessing whose photo it is, receiving a score based on time and accuracy of their answer. After 10 pictures, the Photo Roulette champion is crowned!

Photo Roulette features:
- 3-10 players in a competitive and easy-to-learn game
- Super fun and social PARTY GAME for all ages
- Get to know your friends and family through their photos
- Relive amazing moments with photos you had forgotten
- Highscore list after each round and game end

The photos are only displayed for 5 seconds, so your friends and family will only see them briefly. Feel the thrill before each picture and share the hilarious moments that occur with the pictures of your friends and family!

1177 Oslo
Norway

title: Photo Roulette

comments: I DONT LIKE THE UPDATE THAT GIVES YOU MORE TIME AFTER FORCE OF CARDS . IT ALLOWS PEOPLE WAYY!!!!! TO MUCH TIME TO COMPLETE THE BOARD. AND IT WAS MORE COMPETETIVE B4. I DONT WANT MY RANKING TO SUFFER BECAUSE OF LUCK.  +Ima a REAL RISK FAN. I have purchased everymap package available. Its fair priced and affordable.The new maps are too easy in my opinion. MAKE MORE MAPS I'LL PAY idc jus MAKE them MORE Challenging

One token per six hours? So you as a content provider only want me to experience three games a day? That is backwards... Do away with the tokens. You will have users clamoring to purchase the DLC if they can play nonstop. This means that you would have zero reason to charge for the premium game. Anyone who has already paid for the premium gets all future DLC for free and the rest of us would be willing to purchase it. This is a great game that could provide substantial income on well placed future DLC and franchise games.

Time and time again a attacking army with 22 troops defeats a defending army of 22 troops and only losses 4 when the defending army is ment to have the upper hand . Also the game is full of cheaters with two profiles in one game so you cant win. Don't waste your money and time this game is dead there are less and less real players left. They dont care about cheaters just money.

The algorithm used to determine rolls / battles is horrible.  After less than 200 games, I have lost over 20k troops, while destroying only 16k.  That amounts to nothing more than a piss poor design.  Unfortunately I paid for this app, so I am stuck with it.   Game definitely isnt worth the price paid.  Don't make the same mistake I made.

This game is great but it could be so much better.   1. The expert AI is too easy to beat. Risk players normally gang up on an opponent, if they are dominating. There should be a legendary option.  2. It would be nice to have a match summary and timeline at the end of a game.    3. There should be an auto-save game feature when playing against the AI, in case the game drops out.  Edit: They seem to have addressed my third point.

Very unfair, questionable dice rolls against computers, obviously rigged so that on single player you can never win, and then online it pits you against people who are expert when you're a beginner so you can clearly never win. Very rigged, fun when you get the chance to play which is once every 12 hours due to them asking you to buy the premium version. Highly unfair

descriptionHTML:
NOW WITH FULL ONLINE MULTIPLAYER AND MATCHMAKING!

Everybody wants to rule the world! Now you can, with a new way to play the classic game of RISK. Play on your TV with Chromecast for the ultimate living room experience or take the battle online with Global Domination mode (must be over 13). Defend your territories, draft troops, and launch attacks for the ultimate conquest against friends, family, and foes. Try the game for free or unlock for unlimited mobile play!

NEW GLOBAL DOMINATION MODE
• Join or host battles against new opponents online
• Use Automatch mode to be pitted up against players of similar rank online
• Climb leaderboards & rank up to Grandmaster
• Additional achievements to earn

FEATURES
• Multiple game modes available: Global Domination online, Play Friends online, Single Player, and Pass & Play
• Up to 6 players/AIs can battle for world domination
• 4 difficulty settings for rookies and veterans
• Authentic rules – it’s the RISK you know and love
• Easily add friends and send challenges
• Guided tutorial mode and in-game help
• Critical game stats and achievements
• Multiple maps* and beautiful graphics
• Fun animated avatars
• Send secret alliance or coordinated attack requests to your fellow generals
• Send emojis to express your wrath or glee as you conquer your opponents

PLAY ON THE BIG SCREEN WITH CHROMECAST
• Connect to your TV with Chromecast and use your tablet or smartphone to control the action
• Chromecast device & network connection required for Play on TV mode
• Each player must have the RISK: Big Screen Edition app installed on their device

*extra maps and player avatars available for an additional cost

*********************************************************************
The app will request the following permissions on Android 6.0+:

Request Message: Allow ​*RISK*​ to access your contacts?

Request Message: Allow ​*RISK*​ to access photos, media and files on your device?
Purpose: to store your player avatar image

So basically I just sat down to play stick hero. And my goal at the end of the day is to reach at least 100 cherries. Same today. But as I start playing I don't find any cherries on my path. "That is weird!" I say to myself. I try to double tap to get cherries it doesn't allow it. So I go to the home page to see how many cherries I have ..... the icon isn't even there???   Despite that concern, love the game its so much fun ! For u people who are looking for a fun catchy game to play here is the perfect game. Please download so much fun and a great game to put on your device!

Awesome but I have some ideas This game is awesome and it never ceases to make me happy. But buying new characters is kind of pointless. Developers you probably won't see this or even care if you do but I think that when you buy new characters the characters should have abilities that you use once a round for free or you can refresh the ability using cherries.

Bug The game is great, and addicting. However, when I tap to go below to grab a cherry, and tap again to go above the bar it doesn't register the second tap so I end up dying. I've played this on several phones so I know it isn't a problem with my phone. Please fix this. It happens every single game. *It now freezes for a split sec and makes my bar go ten times higher than it should. For that, it's now 2 stars. Your other games do this too.

False Advertising I mean, in a way. The help example is slower than the actual game. The platform grows faster and the guy runs across instead of the leisurely stroll in the 'tutorial'. Maybe have an option for speed, slower or faster depending on what the player feels like tackling that day. Still a fun game, but come on. We're not all finger-ninjas.

I downloaded this game about a month ago. I can not seem to reach my high score of 72. Although, I average about 40. Overall, it is a decent game, and a good time - waster. I like the walking / stick version better than the water melon slashing one. I find that one to be a little bit too easy.

descriptionHTML:
ColorMinis Kids is a new kind of coloring and design app for boys and girls on Android. It’s like a 3D coloring book but with realistic figures instead of paper.

Coloring apps are proven to help kids build creativity and color combination skills: and it’s free so start coloring figures now!

Features:
- Color and design anime figures, animals, robots, dogs, castles, and more
- Create your own color combinations or use designer palettes in this new figure coloring book
- Combine color with Realistic 3D clay, gloss, shine, metal, glass, sparkle and more
- Collect Gems by watching Ads to get FREE Models
- Easy controls! Simply tap the materials and color, and pinch to zoom on the HD figure details
- Experiment with beautiful palette combinations
- Simply swipe the figure to view from different angles
- Add custom name tags and fill a collection shelf
- Create animated gifs and pictures of your creations
- Works offline! No wifi needed to relax on the best 3D coloring book.
- Variety of figure styles and themes created by artists from around the world

We regularly add new figures so keep an eye out for updates.

Please help us to make more ColorMinis Figures by rating 5 stars and sharing with your friends!

We’re working so that ColorMinis apps run well on all Android devices. Please report any issue you may have at http://www.figuromo.com.
developerAddress: 30 East 33rd Avenue, Eugene, OR USA
recentChanges: New "Long Press" Coloring Feature
summary: Coloring & Design Collection: Like painting color & materials on real sculptures
title: ColorMinis Kids - Color & Create real 3D art

Great overall game, very fun to play with friends, but there is a major problem. I am a careful drawer, so I often use the undo button. However, almost every time I hit the undo button, an area of my drawing gets distorted (usually slowly grows bigger than I drew it) and also a random straight thick bar will also form on its own in those distorted areas. Very frustrating for someone who likes to draw with detail. Please fix. Also, now when I try to open a game with a friend the replay doesn't show any letters, and when it's time to guess no picture shows up. It's just full of bugs that keep me from simply playing the game the way it's supposed to be played.

descriptionHTML:
Play along in Doc McStuffins: Baby Nursery, the first free-to-download Doc McStuffins app. There’s so much you can do to take care of your very own adorable baby dolls, with the help of Doc McStuffins herself!


• CeCe and Bunny baby dolls are ready for you to bring home, name, and accessorize.
Zebra, Penguin, Butterfly, Bumblebee, Ladybug, Turtle, Panda, Puppy, Kitty and Lobster baby dolls are also available through in-app purchase.
• Care for your baby dolls by bathing, feeding, napping, and playing fun, interactive games with them.
• You can even capture their special moments and earn stickers in your very own customizable baby book.

So much to do!
• 12 baby dolls: Collect all nine—each with a unique theme, nursery, outfits & accessories
• Meal time: Feed your baby doll different yummy meals
• Play time: Bond with ticklish laughs and giggles
• Peek-a-boo: Surprise and delight to watch their silly responses
• Bath time: Give a soothing bath with lots of bubbles and fun
• Change station: Change diapers and play dress up with adorable outfits
• Nap time: Soothe your baby doll to sleep with different sights & sounds
• Baby Book: Capture your baby dolls’ special moments in your very own, customizable baby book
• Bouncer: Play with many activities like the xylophone, twirly flower and more
• Birthday Party: Decorate and celebrate with fun party themes, including your very own cake
• Doc McStuffins and Lambie are on-call to lend a helping hand!

Like us on Facebook for cool games tips & the latest news: www.Facebook.com/DisneyGames.

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. This mobile app contains in-app purchases and advertising messages, including the option to watch ads for rewards. In-app purchases cost real money and are charged to your account. To disable or adjust the ability to make in-app purchases, adjust your device settings. This is a limited app experience. The full, unlimited app experience is available to purchase at the conclusion of the limited experience. Not all levels or characters are included in the free experience. We respect your wishes regarding your Privacy. You can exercise control and choice by resetting your Advertising Identifier in your device’s Privacy Settings.

This app uses the Read/Write_external_storage function to save your game's progress.
This app uses your mic to trigger on-screen interactions and animations.

Privacy Policy - http://disneyprivacycenter.com
Children’s Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/
Terms of Use - http://disneytermsofuse.com

© Disney 2017.

comments: love the game, really brings us into the world of dinosaurs. although I'm new at this and alot of the offers you have to pay for to get ahead. I think the difficulty showed be lowered a bit more for new played because some people don't have money on the spot to just purchase meat and dinos off the back.

The game is very good with levelling up and progressing achievable with time. The events and some of the special unlock creature packs can be difficult and slightly imbalanced . But that's the way of a game with purchases. Overall is a good game if you stick with it haven't bought any extra bucks and I feel I'm at a reasonable level.   The only aspect which I think could be added to improve the game is a park editor style which is featured in similar games. As now I have used most the space in the park and takes forever to rearrange every item and dinosaur which I have . A simple remove all and place singularly would be perfect addition

.     It doesn't tell you how to get past level 75. Or how super power your dinosaurs,  example the opponents dinosaurs that have the purple glow. Also unable to redeem the points on either visitor world or the world ran by facebook. Jurrassic World the game also doesn't tell or show you how to get your dinosaurs to the ultimate stage where  these issues. That's why they get a poor rating from this consumer. If everyone boycotted the game and cancelled their memberships, you can guarantee they would fix all glitches and explain away the issues that are asked.

This game is freaking awesome. I just live it. The graphics are great, the controls work amazingly, and I LOVE the designs for the dinosaurs. The only problem I have with the game is that very recently, I would open the app, it would load all the way, and then it would crash and kick me out! I really hope that they fix this. I use the LG Aristo, but it has always worked fine. I want to get back to playing the game, so Ludia, please fix the game.

I love the game. Its amazing. The biggest problem I encounter is the loading time of the game. I use a verry good wifi conection and even in this case it takes 35 minutes to load the game. Btw I have a huawei p9 and extra memory card of 125 gb so no storage problems. Since download I still have this long time in loading. To bad the game is amazing.

Sorry for being alittke harsh. Thank you for fixing it. Now I can use the prize drop. And I don't get a million enteladons at once. I hope in the future this game becomes more of a hit than it is right now because the new jurassic world movie. thank you ludia. üëåüòÉüëç

descriptionHTML:
Return to Isla Nublar with the creators of the smash hit Jurassic Park™ Builder for your next adventure: Jurassic World™: The Game, the official mobile game based on this summer’s epic action-adventure. Bring to life more than 150 colossal dinosaurs from the new film and challenge your opponents in earth-shaking battles. Construct the theme park of tomorrow in this unrivaled build-and-battle dinosaur experience.

In order to build a winning Battle Arena team, you’ll need to design the most efficient and effective park, one that will allow your dinosaurs to thrive and evolve. Discover new and amazing species of dinosaurs by acquiring surprise-filled card packs. Join Owen, Claire and your favorite characters from the film as, daily, you feed and genetically enhance your dinosaurs. Now that the park is open, it’s time to make Jurassic World™ your own!

In Jurassic World™ The Game you will:

* Defy the laws of science as you COLLECT, HATCH & EVOLVE more than 150 unique dinosaurs!
* CONSTRUCT & UPGRADE iconic buildings & lush landscapes inspired by the film.
* CHALLENGE opponents from around the world in earth-shaking BATTLES!
* INTERACT with characters from the film as you navigate exciting new storylines & thrilling missions!
* ENHANCE your experience with Hasbro® Brawlasaurs™ toys – scan each toy dinosaur & battle with it directly in the game!
* CHOOSE from multiple card packs; each can bring a special dinosaur to life!
* EARN daily rewards such as coins, DNA & other essential resources.


Membership

* Jurassic World The Game offers a monthly subscription at USD $9.99, please note prices may vary depending on sales taxes or countries.
* The user will be asked to login to his Google account (if not already) prior to the purchase.
* The payment will be charged to Google Account at confirmation of purchase.
* Additional information will be provided afterward stating that subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
* We also mention there that subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
* The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
* No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
* Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Privacy policy can be found at http://legal.ludia.net/mobile/privacy_black.php

Terms of service can be found at http://legal.ludia.net/mobile/terms_black.php


By installing this application you agree to the terms of the licensed agreements.

Like us on Facebook for fan giveaways, the latest news and updates! (facebook.com/jurassicworldthegame)

Jurassic World™ is a trademark and copyright of Universal Studios and Amblin Entertainment, Inc. Licensed by Universal Studios Licensing LLC. All rights reserved.

Please note: Jurassic World™: The Game is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

descriptionHTML:
🎹Piano by Gismart is an electric keyboard simulator app with virtual musical instruments to help you learn chords and music notes for free! Learn how to play the piano keys in many interesting ways! 👍

The only realistic piano and musical instruments learning app with free songs made by musicians for musicians and beginners! Download right now and learn to play the piano keyboard on your Phone or Tablet for free!

Our digital Piano app lets you choose sounds from a number of music instruments: from a grand and fortepiano, to the violin, harpsichord, accordion, organ and guitar. Carve out original melodies and record them to play back via different musical instruments. You can also share your musical creations on social media, including Creatubbles, a safe sharing place for children and adults.

You’ll learn various chords and how to read sheet music, taking you on your journey to become a virtual piano player and maestro!

Here’s more:
Enjoy our cool mini games and start playing the piano without any lessons. Perform famous songs by tapping keys under falling tiles in the Magic Tiles game. Improve your sense of timing and tempo by tapping random white and black keys in the Magic Keys.

★★★ Piano app features ★★★
✔ Full 88 key piano keyboard;
✔ Magic Tiles and Magic Keys mini games;
✔ 9 Different piano keyboards and musical instruments: Piano keyboard, Grand Piano, Organ, Harpsichord, Accordion, Electric Guitar, Harp, Cello Pizzicato, Vintage piano;
✔ Single or Dual scrollable keyboard;
✔ Free piano songs;
✔ Popular and classic piano songs;
✔ Piano record feature - record and share your plays;
✔ Piano HD.

comments: Good timekiller. BUT as always... You have to pay up for the cool stuff... If you're going for F2P, you only get the basic stuff... And well it's getting really boring after some time. After some good hours it get's really repetitive... Right know it feels like nobody takes care about rhis game anymore. No more patches, updates, no new stuff. It's a shame. This game has some potential but it's getting wasted here.

Very Relaxing! Just watching the acid mix with water, then the black hole making it disappear is sooo satisfying! Definitely recommended! But the stuff you pay for.. Its kinda dumb. Like, pay for this and this and not satisfied, yeah, just get rid of that. <3

What a wonderful little way to give your boredom a time out. Developer, great job for what I read as a cool way to give back to the world freely! I have wondered if more pictures are an upcoming addition...? Back to my sand box! üòÉ

I really do like this game but like I said I might not have it that long because there is not much to do on it I need the premium stuff! Thank you for the hard work on this game but it is not enough to satisfy me fully, anyway let me know what's up!...

comments: This so freaking awesome, a woo hoo maker! I kept mumbling awesome, awesome, when i passed a car. And this is first time i'm very exited when i managed to finish a level, even after that, i repeat again till i can surpass it perfectly. Even i haven't sleep for 2 days, felt like an alien or zombie, etc. But this game cheers me up alot. Recommended ? Yes! Good job dev, just download it guys. Lu pasti hepi dah! Keren!

Wow... as I was writing this review it suddenly all disappeared as it said unfortunately traffic rider has stopped. Wow.. nice. I cannot even open the game without freezing up my tablet. Real nice. And tbh I love this game! On my phone it works..... üò•üò£üòàüëπ

One of the best motorcycle game to date, weather conditions are great, bikes are great and handling is great, but the bad ai on higher difficulty level a few times are ridiculous and messes up everything.  Sometimes a truck speeds up to 150km/h just to close off that small gap, where you could slip through, but next time all cars in all lane slow down at once, so you can't pass anywhere, even though there's nothing in front of them. This is really annoying, when every second counts and there's no way to pass them for 4-7 seconds. Apart from this the game is great. The keep changing weather conditions is great too.
There are some idiot missions such as combo overheading. I would give this game 5 stars if not those missions.
I can't stop playing this!! The missions are really hard and thats what makes it fun! although i almost threw my phone twice. but this game is amazing! the graphic is good too!
I brought lots of upgrades and didn't play for some time. Installed on my new phone, same google account and now everything is gone. I feel completely ripped off!
description: Another masterpiece from the creators of Traffic Racer. This time, you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience, but also retaining the old school fun and simplicity.Traffic Rider takes the endless racing genre to a whole new level by adding a full career mode, first person view perspective, better graphics and real life recorded bike sounds. The essence of smooth arcade racing is still there but in the shell of the next generation. descriptionHTML:
Another masterpiece from the creators of Traffic Racer. This time, you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience, but also retaining the old school fun and simplicity.

Traffic Rider takes the endless racing genre to a whole new level by adding a full career mode, first person view perspective, better graphics and real life recorded bike sounds. The essence of smooth arcade racing is still there but in the shell of the next generation. Ride your bike in the endless highway roads overtaking the traffic, upgrade and buy new bikes to beat the missions in career mode.

Now it is time to hit the roads with a motorcycle!

FEATURES
- First person camera view
- 26 motorbikes to choose from
- Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes
- Detailed environments with day and night variations
- Career mode with 70+ missions
- Online leaderboards and 30+ achievements
- Support for 19 languages

TIPS
- The faster you ride, the more scores you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake traffic cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way gives extra score and cash
- Do wheelies to get extra score and cash

FOLLOW US
* http://facebook.com/trafficridergame
* http://twitter.com/traffic_rider

*** No Timers, No Fuel *** Just pure endless fun!

Traffic Rider will be updated regularly with your suggestions. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
